The 10 hottest places on earth - with top spot reaching sweltering 56C [INSIGHT] Exact date when parts of Britain to bake in sizzling 25C warm weather [EXCLUSIVE] Rainstorm set to smash into UK as every inch of country covered [WEATHER MAPS] Trending Met Office's five-day forecast Today: A bright start to the day across northern and eastern parts of the UK. Cloudier skies elsewhere with outbreaks of rain. The cloud and rain spreading northeastwards as the day progresses, with heavy and thundery showers following. Feeling humid. Tonight: Scattered heavy showers are possible through this evening. Overnight it will remain mostly cloudy, with the risk of further showers, though these mainly focussed across northern and western areas. Wednesday: Wednesday should be a brighter day, though there will be a mix of sunshine and showers. Some of the showers will be heavy with the risk of hail and thunder. Outlook for Thursday to Saturday: Sunshine and showers for Thursday, once again some heavy with hail and thundery. Slowly becoming drier through Friday and into Saturday, with increasing amounts of sunshine. Temperatures near average. title: Premier League clubs ‘are trying to shift away from season tickets’ as staggering prices to attend matches are revealed
creator: Gary Stonehouse
content: PREMIER LEAGUE clubs are “trying to shift away from season tickets” and no longer want “people like me and you” attending. The 2023-24 campaign drew to a close nine days ago as Manchester City claimed their fourth straight title . It’s been another memorable season - but we all know that to witness the Premier League action live will cost you a fortune. We are used to seeing the likes of celebrities Kim Kardashian at Arsenal and Hollywood mega star Tom Hanks watching Aston Villa . And even sporting sensations such as darts teen Luke Littler have been spotted in with the prawn sandwich brigade . But another thing becoming more and more common - annoyingly so for longer-term fans - is the sight of half-and-half scarves in the crowd - and don’t get us started on the shirt begging signs! However, it seems that the tourist fan is what more and more clubs want to attract instead of the traditional season ticket holders. That is according to finance expert Kieran Maguire, who has just completed a study into the staggering price of attending Premier League football truly is. He worked, from the stats comparing the 2021-22 season to 2022-23, that the average price for a ticket, including VAT, was £45. That total price figure included the cost of corporate tickets and hospitality at each club. BEST FREE BET SIGN UP OFFERS FOR UK BOOKMAKER S There was an 11 per cent increase within the 12 month period with Chelsea being the most expensive ticket. It worked out at a fee of £91 per fan per match at Stamford Bridge while Nottingham Forest were the lowest with an average cost of just over £21. His study revealed that Tottenham were the second most-expensive to watch at a cost of just under £85 with Arsenal close behind at £83.49. It cost £71.53 per fan to go to Manchester United’s Old Trafford while Liverpool made up the top five with a £70.79 total. Champions Man City's average was £54.02 while Leeds United, who suffered relegation last term, were the top dogs from outside of the top six. It was £44.63 on average to go and watch them at Elland Road. Season ticket prices are always a controversial subject, especially with Arsenal’s lowest for next season priced at £1,072 with Man City also raising theirs by 10.4 per cent. But Maguire told BBC Five Live that season ticket holders no longer hold the same importance to clubs - and they may soon be a thing of the past. He said: “We are also trying to see some clubs shift away from season ticket holders because as private equity organisations, they are revenue maximers.” Then speaking directly to the person interviewing him, he said: “They do not want people like you and me at football. “We have served our time. We did our bit in the 70s, 80s and 90s when nobody was interested in football. “Now that football is the sexiest thing on the planet, let’s attract the middle class, the tourist fans, the fans that will go to the mega store and the matches and so on. “I think this is a direction of travel and it’s only going to continue to travel one way.” Maguire then explained how he had been hired by the Spirit of Shankly fan group to do an analysis of Liverpool’s prices from 1992-93 through to the present day. And that led to another warning that will strike fear into supporters across the country. He added: “We’ve had freezes but at the same time there’s been significant increases in the last couple of years. “Once that becomes embedded then I think it will become part of the expectation of the owners. “They will try to put up prices each year.” STAY in the know this summer with The Sun's transfer experts. Chelsea have been given permission from Leicester to speak to Enzo Maresca . Liverpool and Chelsea are eyeing a summer move for Crysencio Summerville. Premier League clubs are targeting Tosin Adarabioyo, who will be a free agent when his Fulham contract expires next month. title: ‘Cuter than the actual ones!’ Disney fans rave over Asda’s Loungefly dupe that’s almost £68 cheaper than the original
creator: Sarah Bull
content: THEY'RE some of the most collectable Disney items around. But Loungefly bags certainly don't come cheap - with even the smallest costing around £80 new. So it's no wonder Disney fans are racing to Asda for a new dupe that some people are labelling "cuter than the actual ones". Katie took to TikTok to share a video of the find, after coming across the super-cute £12 backpacks in her local supermarket. "Disney Loungefly dupe in Asda!" she wrote over the top of her clip . The bag - called the Disney Classics Character Rucksack on the George website - features the faces of some of the most beloved Disney characters. Alongside Dumbo, Simba and the Cheshire Cat, there's Peter Pan, one of the 101 Dalmatians, Lady and the Tramp, Pumbaa from The Lion King and Marie from The Aristocats. The backpack is done up with a zip, and has pretty iridescent silver handles. People were quick to comment on the video, with one writing: "That is actually really cute!" "I just had to buy this straight away!" another admitted. "We need to find this tonight," a third commented, tagging a friend. "How cute is this!" someone else wrote. "I completely forgot about loungefly and just seen they have a shrek bag," another added. "I'm in love with it! "I'm Shrek obsessed as well as Disney!" "Some of the Asda Loungefly dupes are cuter then the actual ones," someone else said. "Literally!" Katie replied. Loungefly started in Southern California in 1998, creating licensed fashion accessories for all ages. The company was purchased by Funko in May 2019, after a number of years trying to work out a deal. Now Loungefly is most famous for its Disney offerings, although they do also sell other licensed items too - such as Marvel, Hello Kitty and Harry Potter. Grocery inflation means we're all feeling the pinch but shopping with these points in mind could save you hundreds of pounds a year: Visit Which? to find out more. The bags are typically made from faux vinyl, with the mini backpack the most popular size. And when it comes to their collectability, it usually depends on how many of that bag design was made. However, you can tell if your Loungefly was made before the company was bought by Funko by checking to see if there's the iconic Funko crown on the metal plaque on the front of the bag. Loungefly bags released before the Funko takeover often have a heart instead of a Funko crown, and some of the original Disney ones can fetch up to £1,000.

title: Health campaign launched to raise awareness of bladder cancer symptoms
creator: Jill Theobald
description: PEOPLE across South Yorkshire are being urged to seek advice from their GP if they notice anything unusual which could be an early sign or symptom of bladder cancer.
content: As part of Bladder Cancer Awareness Month and the recently launched Peace of Mind campaign , the South Yorkshire and Bassetlaw Cancer Alliance wants people to be vigilant and proactive in seeking medical advice if they notice any concerning changes in their bodies. More than 10,000 new cases of bladder cancer are diagnosed each year in the UK and, while it predominantly affects older people, it can occur at any age. Advertisement Advertisement Did you know with an ad-lite subscription to Rotherham Advertiser, you get 70% fewer ads while viewing the news that matters to you. Health bosses say recognising the early signs and symptoms of bladder cancer is “crucial” as early detection increases the chances of effective treatment. Symptoms include: Dr Steph Edgar, clinical lead for the SYB Cancer Alliance, said: “Being attuned to your body and recognising any changes is crucial. “Bladder cancer, like many cancers, is most treatable when caught early. “If you experience any of these symptoms, get Peace of Mind and arrange to see your GP as soon as possible.” Advertisement Advertisement She added: “Most people with these symptoms don’t have bladder cancer, but it is better to see your GP so you can get a diagnosis as soon as possible.” For more information about the Peace of Mind campaign and bladder cancer symptoms, visit the campaign website https://bit.ly/4dp0h9O .

title: Labour’s plans for workers is a pro-boss compromise
description: Labour’s planned reform of workers’ rights has “more holes in it than Swiss cheese,” said the Unite union leader Sharon Graham. While fully backing a Labour government, Graham added, “The number of caveats and getouts means it is in danger of becoming a bad bosses’ charter.” In particular, Graham pointed out the plan was “NOT...
content: Keir Starmer, leader of the Labour Party, and Tom Rutland, Labour’s candidate for East Worthing and Shoreham, speak to activists after a keynote speech at Lansing Parish Hall in West Sussex (Picture: Keir Starmer on Flickr) Labour’s planned reform of workers’ rights has “more holes in it than Swiss cheese,” said the Unite union leader Sharon Graham. While fully backing a Labour government , Graham added, “The number of caveats and getouts means it is in danger of becoming a bad bosses’ charter.” In particular, Graham pointed out the plan was “NOT a ban on fire and rehire . Unite will continue to push for a total ban and will not support anything less”. In the latest and presumably final version of the policy published last Friday, there are rude shocks for union leaders who thought Labour would deliver measures for them to support Keir Starmer. Retain Shadow chancellor Rachel Reeves said bosses must retain the right to fire and rehire their workers on inferior contracts in some circumstances. Labour’s package of reforms was first set out in 2021. But the party diluted many of the policies during a meeting of the national policy forum, its internal policymaking body, last summer. The Financial Times newspaper revealed this month that Labour was further watering down parts of the New Deal for Working People in an attempt to woo big business. Upset by these leaks, leaders of 11 trade unions affiliated to the Labour Party turned up at party headquarters to meet Starmer in mid-May. A chummy statement followed celebrating that “Labour and the affiliated unions had a constructive discussion today. Together we have reiterated Labour’s full commitment to the New Deal for Working People as agreed in July.” But now—and it should be no surprise—it turns out that the corporations will still influence what happens on key issues. Labour needs the support of trade union leaders to finance and staff its activities. So it makes some gestures towards the unions. However, it is all highly limited and subordinate to not scaring the corporations. Labour promises some changes within 100 days of an election victory. But the document adds, “much of the detail will be based on regulations so we can react flexibly to changing economic circumstances”. So for Labour economic problems will come before workers’ rights. It goes on, “Where these plans require substantial secondary legislation, we will engage widely with experts and stakeholders, including employers and trade unions. “We have acknowledged that there are other areas of the New Deal that will take longer to review and implement. We will carry out full and detailed consultation.” Bosses’ voices are central to the final outcome. Promises to improve the minimum wage and sick leave have no figure attached to them. An earlier pledge to pass laws allowing workers to disconnect and not be contacted by their employer outside working hours has gone. Winning rights under Starmer will take struggle from day one of a new government. Victims of stalking increase amid poor police response Plus a report reveals torture in Israeli jails All out for the national demo on 8 June Labour is no way out of the recent disgraceful governments

title: Liv Morgan Retains Her Title on WWE Raw Due to Dominik Mysterio
keywords: wwe king & queen of the ring 2024
creator: Ojas Kulkarni
description: The Judgment Day member Dominik Mysterio once again caused problems by helping Liv Morgan retain her title on WWE RAW. At the WWE King and Queen of the Ring premium live event, during the WWE Women’s World Title match between Becky Lynch and Liv Morgan, Dominik Mysterio interfered, causing Lynch to lose her title. As [...]The post Liv Morgan Retains Her Title on WWE Raw Due to Dominik Mysterio appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
content: Liv Morgan Retains Her Title on WWE Raw Due to Dominik Mysterio By The Judgment Day member once again caused problems by helping Liv Morgan retain her title on WWE RAW. At the WWE King and Queen of the Ring premium live event, during the WWE Women’s World Title match between Becky Lynch and Liv Morgan, Dominik Mysterio interfered, causing Lynch to lose her title. As a result, Becky Lynch invoked her rematch clause on the latest edition of WWE RAW. The promotion announced that the match would take place inside a steel cage. The show also witnessed The Judgment Day member Damian Priest questioning Dominik Mysterio’s antics at WWE King and Queen of the Ring, where he unintentionally helped Liv Morgan win the title. Priest told Mysterio that he messed up big time and that he better fix it tonight. In the main event of the show, the match between Liv Morgan and Becky Lynch showcased a lot of back-and-forth action between both stars. As the match reached its climax, Dominik Mysterio once again interfered. Mysterio opened the cage door and motioned for Becky Lynch to escape, but Finn Balor and JD McDonagh intervened, Mysterio’s actions. Amidst the chaos, , who had been searching for JD McDonagh throughout the show, entered the scene, chasing McDonagh and Balor. During the chase, Strowman accidentally collided with Dominik Mysterio, causing Mysterio to fall into the cage door and slam it into Lynch’s face. This distraction proved beneficial for Liv Morgan, who seized the opportunity to crawl out of the door and retain her title once again with the help of Dominik Mysterio. Liv Morgan surprises fans with a kiss for Dominik Mysterio on WWE RAW Dominik Mysterio, who once again helped Liv Morgan retain her title on WWE RAW, received an unexpected kiss from Morgan. After Morgan secured her victory over Becky Lynch, she encountered Mysterio standing on the ramp in disbelief. In a stunning moment during the show, Liv Morgan surprised fans by kissing Dominik out of the blue as they shared a glance. Dominik Mysterio, visibly shaken, received a laugh from Morgan. This development adds intrigue, as Rhea Ripley, Dominik Mysterio’s partner, had previously been injured by Morgan. Amidst this, Liv Morgan has been seen alongside The Judgment Day members Finn Balor and JD McDonagh. Will this kiss lead her to join the faction and potentially replace Rhea Ripley? Only time will tell. As a devoted professional wrestling fan and writer, the sport is a vital source of joy and escape for me. Wrestling has been a consistent pillar of stability and comfort, shaping the person I am today. Growing up, it played a significant role in my life, with John Cena being a superhero figure for me. title: Kenyatta holds meetings with key SA officials ahead of elections
creator: WANGECHI PURITY
description: NAIROBI, Kenya, May 28 – Former President Uhuru Kenyatta on Monday met with the National Operational and Intelligent Structure (NATJOINS) led by South African Police Service Major General Mashadi Selepe in Johannesburg ahead of the South Africa upcoming General Elections scheduled for tomorrow. During the meeting Kenyatta who is also the head of the African [...]
content: NAIROBI, Kenya, May 28 – Former President Uhuru Kenyatta on Monday met with the National Operational and Intelligent Structure (NATJOINS) led by South African Police Service Major General Mashadi Selepe in Johannesburg ahead of the South Africa upcoming General Elections scheduled for tomorrow. During the meeting Kenyatta who is also the head of the African Union Election Observation Mission (AUEOM) and Major General Selepe discussed security measures for the upcoming 29th General Elections. The former President has been conducting a series of high-level meetings in Johannesburg, South Africa to assess the country’s preparedness for the upcoming General Elections. “We are here to observe the people of South Africa exercise their democratic right and express their will,” he wrote on X formerly Twitter after meeting with the Commissioners of the Electoral Commission of South Africa, led by Chairman Mosotho Moepya, at the Gallagher Convention Centre. Kenyatta also held discussions with South Africa’s Chief Justice Raymond Zondo, emphasizing the judiciary’s role in upholding the rule of law and ensuring fair and transparent resolution of any electoral disputes. The former Kenyan president was appointed by the African Union Commission (AUC) to lead the AUEOM, which consists of sixty short-term observers (STOs) and three Core Team electoral experts. The mandate of the observer mission is to provide an impartial assessment of the quality of the elections and ensure they meet regional, continental, and international standards for democratic elections. The Kenyatta-led team will release its preliminary findings and recommendations on the conduct of the elections on May 31. Thereafter a final and comprehensive report shall be released within two months from the date of the announcement of the final election results. See author's posts

title: Liabilities, Damages and Other Contentious Issues in International Commercial Agreements: 2-Day Virtual Seminar (September 9-10, 2024)
description: Dublin, May 28, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Liabilities, Damages and other Contentious Issues in International Commercial Agreements Training Course" training has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.Reduce your exposure to risk and liability in your contracts in two essential days
content: Dublin, May 28, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Liabilities, Damages and other Contentious Issues in International Commercial Agreements Training Course" training has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. Reduce your exposure to risk and liability in your contracts in two essential days Now is not the time for weaknesses in your commercial contracts when risk and liability have to be kept to a minimum. During the negotiation of international commercial agreements, the exact exposure in relation to damages is often not properly identified, anticipated or understood. Frequently, the parties are: Unaware of the true nature of the law of damages in the chosen governing law of the contract Unaware of the fundamental differences of approach in the common law and civil law systems Unaware that their attempts at limiting or excluding their liability may be ineffective This specialist two-day seminar has been specifically developed to focus exclusively on this subject. The seminar offers a wide-ranging and detailed understanding of the law of damages under English law with comparisons to civil law jurisdictions. Presented by an international specialist in the field, the seminar shall enable participants to effectively draft and negotiate contracts with knowledge and confidence. Certification CPD: 12 hours for your records Certificate of completion Key Topics Covered Day 1 Introduction Key differences in civil and common law Identifying potential legal risks Fundamental distinctions Emerging trends Drafting approaches Introduction to comparative exercises Pre-contract agreements - background and drafting NDAs, MoUs, letters of intent Pre-contractual liability Good faith Confidentiality agreements - binding? Templates of pre-contract documents Redrafting template documents Warranties, representations, guarantees and indemnities Differences Which to use and when Remedies for breach Relationship with entire agreement Indemnities - examples The court approach and contra proferentem Types of guarantees - performance and on demand Exclusions and limitations of liability Liability for personal injury or death Liability for late delivery, performance or similar How to limit the maximum aggregate damages Fundamental breach vs breach of fundamental obligation Specific examples of limitation of liability clauses from different jurisdictions Exclusions, limitations and Maximum liability Force majeure, frustration and economic hardship The concepts of force majeure and economic hardship Doctrine of frustration Changing circumstances and unforeseen events Hardship clauses Defining the events Typical claims The termination period Re-execution/renegotiating The legal effect Comparative workshop session Practical workshop where, using a case study as a basis, clauses will be examined that are interpreted differently in different jurisdictions, including: Force majeure Exclusion clauses Approaches to interpretation Limitation of liability Liquidated damages and penalties Drafting techniques Day 2 Direct, indirect damages and consequential loss Types of damages Damages for breach of contract Back-to-back contracts Physical damages Costs and expenses Waste Loss of profit Consequential losses and expenses Loss of opportunity, expectation and amenity Examples of clauses from common and civil law Direct, indirect damages and consequential loss Q&A Interactive Session: Identifying types of damages Liquidated damages and penalties defined - comparative analysis Recoverability of liquidated damages and penalties Rules of interpretation and evidence requirement Types of contract to which the rules do or do not apply Types of clauses to which the rules do or do not apply Templates with comparative clauses New Supreme Court rule on liquidated and ascertained damages and penalties - Cavendish v Makdessi Choice of law, jurisdiction and arbitration Part 1 - choice of law and jurisdiction Legal basis Applicable law in the absence of choice Limits of choice of law Natural place of jurisdiction Choice of forum clauses Limits of choice of forum clauses Brussels and Rome Regulations - post-Brexit Direct applicability and the chosen law rule Choice of law, jurisdiction and arbitration Part 2 - arbitration and dispute resolution Choice of arbitration, drafting of an arbitration clause, avoiding pathological clauses Alternative dispute resolution - conciliation, mediation and ADR Enforcement: The New York Convention and beyond For more information about this training visit https://www.researchandmarkets.com/r/rmyhgk About ResearchAndMarkets.com ResearchAndMarkets.com is the world's leading source for international market research reports and market data. We provide you with the latest data on international and regional markets, key industries, the top companies, new products and the latest trends.

title: Shocking moment pro-Palestine mob chants 'hold the line!' as they push back police
description: The protest is the latest of numerous similar demonstrations on campuses across the UK in recent weeks.
content: Pro-Palestine demonstrators in the clip (Image: NC) Hundreds of protesters chanted “hold the line for Palestine ” clashed with police during angry demonstrations on the campus of Manchester University in footage circulating on social media. One activist can be heard shouting “******* come on” in the clip, shared via the Black Lives Matter hashtag. Activists attempted to storm an exam building on the campus last night, triggering a huge police presence. Multiple police vehicles were pictured along Oxford Road at about 8.30pm, including a specialist Tactical Aid Unit van. Students broke into Whitworth Hall, with some barricading themselves in, reports the Manchester Evening News . READ MORE: British tourists face delays as France warns EU rules threaten 'public order' Our people are pushing @gmpolice back. "Hold the line for Palestine." ???????????????????????? pic.twitter.com/McWR7cbY84 — redsarah99???????????? #BlackLivesMatter???????????? (@redsarah99) May 27, 2024 A statement issued by the University of Manchester said: "Over the weekend, a group of students from our University gained unauthorised access to the Whitworth Hall complex. “Various entrances and access points have been unlawfully barricaded, and occupiers have broken onto a balcony, which poses significant health and safety risks to the occupiers and others.” University officials were in discussions with Greater Manchester Fire and Rescue Services about the risks, which went well beyond those we have seen previously”, the statement continued. It continued: “We have written to the individuals occupying the Whitworth Hall complex, requesting that they vacate the premises to allow student exam to proceed as planned. Unfortunately, they have refused. Don't miss... University of Oxford student quits college council due to 'tide of antisemitism' [LATEST] Rishi Sunak mobbed by Pro-Palestine protesters as he visits one UK city [LATEST] Brilliant moment pro-Israel protesters get their own back on pro-Palestine mob [LATEST] The University Of Manchester and The Manchester Museum exterior buildings, along The Oxford Road, we (Image: William Lailey / SWNS) SUBSCRIBE Invalid email We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you've consented to and to improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and 3rd parties based on our understanding. You can unsubscribe at any time. Read our Privacy Policy “As a result, we are now activating our well-established exam contingency plans, but it is deeply disappointing that their actions are directly impacting on what is already, for all those undertaking assessments at present, one of the most intense periods in the academic year. We have emailed all students due to take an exam in the Whitworth Hall of new arrangements and provided updates to Student News.” Extra marshals have been drafted in to direct students to their new exam locations, and the start of the exams was being delayed to account for the disruption, the university spokesman said. They added: “The duration of the exam will remain unchanged, and we will continue to do everything we can to ensure that the action of this small group does not impact our students further. "As the University has been clear in the formal notice delivered to them today and in previous formal notices issued to occupiers, the University firmly support students’ rights to freedom of speech, freedom of expression, and peaceful protest. Trending “These are fundamental rights that allow for a healthy exchange of ideas. However, deliberately disrupting exams clearly violates the standards of behaviour and conduct from students, as outlined in our Student Charter and student disciplinary regulations." Earlier this month, students set up a Gaza protest camp at Brunswick Park, also on campus, vowing to stay there until the university “meets their demands”. Some Jewish students has complained the camp left them feeling “intimidated”. Exoress.co.uk has contacted Greater Manchester Police for comment. title: From corruption to unemployment: My reasons behind my voting disinterest
Kickoff | Ahly 'make decision' on Tau's future after CAFCL triumph
description: With uncertainty continuing to surround Percy Tau's future at Al Ahly, the Egyptian giants have now reportedly made a new decision regarding the Bafana Bafana star.
content: After winning their record-extending 12th CAF Champions League title on the weekend, the Red Devils' hierarchy has taken steps to ensure that they remain competitive on all fronts, with one of those steps being to renew the contracts of some of their top stars, according to . It is reported that Ahly's board of directors, led by president Mahmoud El Khatib, has also decided that fresh players will be added to their roster during the upcoming transfer window. While they may feel that reinforcements are necessary, the club's chiefs are believed to have settled on renewing the contracts of duo Mohamed Hany and Amr El Solia. It has also been claimed that a decision has been made to extend Tau's stay in Cairo, despite his reported intention to leave them in search of another opportunity elsewhere, with the player said to want a move back to Europe and also recently being linked with a switch to DStv Premiership side Kaizer Chiefs. The South Africa star has previously represented Belgian clubs Royale Union Saint-Gilloise, Club Brugge and RSC Anderlecht, as well as English side Brighton & Hove Albion. With his current contract understood to be set to expire in June 2025, the African giants are believed to be keen on retaining his services despite suggestions that initial contract talks were said to have dried up after a number of meetings were held. This news comes despite the club reportedly , for the way in which he reacted to being substituted off by manager Marcel Koller. During his time in Egypt thus far, Tau has made 106 appearances for the Club of the Century, scoring 25 times and assisting a further 13 strikes, and has also won one league title and two CAFCL trophies. title: Health Advantages of Honey
description: The antibacterial properties of honey make it a traditional remedy for wound healing. It has the potential to promote faster healing and reduce the likelihood of infection, according to research.
content: Honey, a Delicious and Healthful Delight, the golden nectar produced by beehives, has been cherished for many years as a delicious all-natural sweetener. In addition to its delightful flavor, honey is an intriguing byproduct of beehives that offers an unexpected array of health benefits. Health Advantages of Honey: A healthier alternative to refined sugar is honey, a natural sweetener. Plus, it has a few more benefits than regular sugar thanks to the minerals, vitamins, and antioxidants it contains. The antibacterial properties of honey make it a traditional remedy for wound healing. It has the potential to promote faster healing and reduce the likelihood of infection, according to research. As a cough suppressant, honey's calming properties are useful for relieving coughs and sore throats. Compared to other OTC cough suppressants, it may work equally as well for children. Digestive Aid: Honey encourages the growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut, which may improve digestion and overall gut health. Even though honey is generally safe for most people, some people may develop allergies to it. Newborns should not consume it because of the risk of botulism. A Worker Bee Only Produces About a Twelveth of a teaspoon of Honey During Its Lifetime! Highly Accelerated Aircraft: There are honeybees that can fly at speeds of up to fifteen miles per hour! Honey Keeps Forever: Honey, when properly sealed and stored at room temperature, will never go bad. Preservation is ensured by the natural antibacterial properties and low moisture content. An intricate "waggle dance" is the means by which honeybees communicate, directing other bees towards food sources. Flavour Variety: How the bees collect nectar from different flowers affects the honey's quality and colour. Honey contains a lot of sugar, therefore it's best to use it carefully. title: Masked Men With Sticks Beat Student, 22, To Death On Patna College Campus
description: A 22-year-old student was beaten to death on the campus of a law college in Bihar's capital, Patna.
content: Harsh Raj, 22, was a third-year student of vocational English A day after a 22-year-old student was beaten to death by masked men on the campus of a college in Patna, police have arrested the main accused and found that an altercation over a dandiya night last year led to the attack that claimed the youngster's life. Harsh Raj, a third-year student of Vocational English at BN College, was at Sultanganj Law College yesterday to take an exam when masked men armed with sticks attacked him. The blows left him critically injured. Police reached the spot and rushed him to a hospital, where he died during treatment. "A heinous crime took place on the law college campus yesterday. Some anti-social elements beat up a student, Harsh Raj, so badly that he died later. We formed a Special Investigation Team. We have now arrested the main accused, who planned the attack. His name is Chandan Yadav, a final-year student of Patna college. He has admitted to the crime and we are working to catch the other accused," City SP (East) Bharat Soni told the media. Police said the attack was triggered by an altercation at a dandiya event during Dussehra last year. "There was a fight between two groups and the tension persisted. This led to the planning of this attack. This is a clear case under Section 302 (murder)," the senior police officer said. The officer said the Dussehra night altercation was followed by several heated exchanges. The accused has said "his ego was hurt", Mr Soni said. Chilling visuals from the campus show the attackers repeatedly hit the victim with sticks. A police case has been registered and police are examining CCTV footage from the campus to identify the accused. Bihar minister Ashok Choudhary has posted a photo of himself and Harsh and said no amount of criticism of the attack is enough. "I am in touch with the authorities regarding this incident. Those guilty will be arrested soon," the JDU leader said, adding that the government is with the family in this crisis. Promoted Listen to the latest songs, only on JioSaavn.com The Opposition has slammed the Nitish Kumar-led BJP-JDU government over the incident. "This is very unfortunate. The law and order situation is worsening by the day ever since the NDA government was formed. They have no control on the administration. The guilty must be arrested at the earliest and face strict punishment," Leader of the Opposition, RJD's Tejashwi Yadav said. Targeting the BJP, he said, "If this had happened in our term, they would have hit the streets and shouted 'jungleraj'. Where are they now? What are they doing?"

title: Mike Brewer teases ‘ultimate 90s muscle car’ transformation in Wheeler Dealers’ Australia tour – as wife issues warning
creator: Jacob Jaffa
content: MIKE Brewer has teased the restoration of the "ultimate muscle car" on Wheeler Dealers' Australian tour. The star revealed that his team had dubbed the motor "Bruce" and would be "taking it to the gym", despite a warning from his wife. In a clip posted to X , Mike said: "Tonight is the next episode of the brand new series of Wheeler Dealers' world tour . "It's the first of our Australian episodes, we're really excited about it. "We went and got the ultimate '90s Australian muscle car , Bruce as we call it. "We take Bruce to the gym...we made it go faster. "It was absolutely brilliant to make." Bruce turned out to be a 2005 Ford Falcon XR-8, which Mike and his co-star Marc 'Elvis' Priestley souped up to take part in a race with its historic rival - the Holden GTS. Former F1 mechanic Marc set about upgrading the fast Ford , including a new exhaust system to make it "sound irresistible" to potential buyers later on in the episode. And they did indeed manage to attract a customer and sell the car on for just over £15,000 (AUS $29,000). Considering they bought it for £12,500 and spent £14,500 restoring it, the team actually took quite a loss on this one. But Mike and Marc seemed more than satisfied with the project after hearing it around a scenic racetrack at Mount Panorama in New South Wales. And in his preview clip, Mike suggested that wouldn't be all they were doing as he mentioned that he got the chance to drive the Interceptor from the original Mad Max film. The Pursuit Special, which was actually a heavily modified Falcon, was driven by Mel Gibson in the 1979 action flick. However, Mike's wife was quick to warn him against giving too much away, saying: "Too much information. "Don't tell them too much. "Tune in, tune in." You can watch Wheeler Dealers every week on Discovery Plus, with new episodes every Monday at 10pm. A basic subscription costs £3.99 a month of £39.99 a year. It comes after Mike showed of the "most expensive car" ever bought in the show's history.

title: Dereck Lively II Finds His Availability Status For Mavericks-Wolves Game 4 Up In The Air
creator: Abhishek Dhariwal
description: The Dallas Mavericks have a 3-0 lead against the Minnesota Timberwolves in the Western Conference Finals. Only a game away from sweeping the Wolves and advancing to the NBA Finals, the Mavericks will look to end this series in the upcoming Game 4. But will Dallas be forced to try to do it without Dereck...The post Dereck Lively II Finds His Availability Status For Mavericks-Wolves Game 4 Up In The Air appeared first on The SportsRush.
content: The Dallas Mavericks have a 3-0 lead against the Minnesota Timberwolves in the Western Conference Finals. Only a game away from sweeping the Wolves and advancing to the NBA Finals, the Mavericks will look to end this series in the upcoming Game 4. But will Dallas be forced to try to do it without Dereck Lively II? As per the official injury report of the league , the Dallas Mavericks have listed Dereck Lively II as “doubtful” for Game 4 against the Minnesota Timberwolves tonight, due to a sprain in his neck. The young big man has been averaging 8.5 points, 7.1 rebounds, and 1.1 blocks per game. He crashed the boards exceptionally well in Game 1 and took some of the scoring pressure upon himself in Game 2. In Game 3, Lively unfortunately played under 10 minutes before he picked up his injury. Worse, while he has not been flagged as ‘Out’ just yet, the pregame evaluation is not likely to clear Derek Lively II for the fourth game of this series. In all likelihood, the Dallas Mavericks will have to take the floor without Dereck Lively II tonight, with Dwight Powell expected to pick up a large portion of the rookie’s minutes. But, with the Minnesota Timberwolves hungry to grab their first victory of this series, will this be enough of an adjustment for the Mavs to grab this closeout game? Only time will tell.

creator: 신용백 기자
description: 이천시가족센터는 이중언어교실 중국어반 소속의 최유리(사동초등학교 3학년)학생이 ‘제15회 경기도 다문화가족 말하기 대회’에서 이중언어 부문에서 장려상을 수상했다고 28일 알렸다.올해로 15회째인 경기도 다문화가족 말하기대회는 다문화가족 구성원 간 이해와 소통을 통해 행복한 가정을 조성하고 글로벌 인재를 육성하기 위해 열리고 있다.이번 대회는 이중언어·한국어 2가지 부문으로 진행됐다. 동영상 심사로 예선을 통과한 본선 진출자 이중언어 부문 15명, 한국어 부문 5명 총 20명이 대회에 참여해 다양한 주제로 자신의 언어 실력을 뽐냈다.
content: 이천시가족센터는 이중언어교실 중국어반 소속의 최유리(사동초등학교 3학년)학생이 ‘제15회 경기도 다문화가족 말하기 대회’에서 이중언어 부문에서 장려상을 수상했다고 28일 알렸다. 올해로 15회째인 경기도 다문화가족 말하기대회는 다문화가족 구성원 간 이해와 소통을 통해 행복한 가정을 조성하고 글로벌 인재를 육성하기 위해 열리고 있다. 이번 대회는 이중언어·한국어 2가지 부문으로 진행됐다. 동영상 심사로 예선을 통과한 본선 진출자 이중언어 부문 15명, 한국어 부문 5명 총 20명이 대회에 참여해 다양한 주제로 자신의 언어 실력을 뽐냈다. 이천시가족센터 대표로 참가한 최유리 학생은 ‘내가 가장 존경하는 사람- 이백’이라는 주제로 한국어와 중국어 순서로 발표해 장려상(경기도지사상)을 수상하는 쾌거를 이뤘다. 최유리 학생은 "경기도 말하기대회에서 이중언어로 상을 받게 되어 뿌듯하고 기쁘다. 센터에서 3년간 꾸준히 수업한 결과인 것 같다"며 "앞으로도 대회에 계속 도전하며, 언어 실력을 키워나가고 싶다"고 전했다. 이천시가족센터는 현재 베트남어, 중국어, 캄보디아어, 일본어 총 4개 언어반을 운영하고 있다. 이천=신용백 기자 syb@kihoilbo.co.kr 기호일보 - 아침을 여는 신문, KIHOILBO

description: IMARC Group's report, titled "PVC Leather Cloth Manufacturing Plant Project Report 2024: Industry Trends, Plant Setup, Machinery, Raw Materials, Investment Opportunities, Cost and Revenue " provides a complete roadmap for setting up a PVC leather cloth manufacturing plant. The report
content: PVC Leather Cloth Manufacturing Plant Project Report 2024: Comprehensive Business Plan, Raw Materials 05-28-2024 10:20 AM CET | Business, Economy, Finances, Banking & Insurance Press release from: IMARC Group IMARC Group's report, titled "PVC Leather Cloth Manufacturing Plant Project Report 2024: Industry Trends, Plant Setup, Machinery, Raw Materials, Investment Opportunities, Cost and Revenue " provides a complete roadmap for setting up a PVC leather cloth manufacturing plant. The report covers various aspects, ranging from a broad market overview to intricate details like unit operations, raw material and utility requirements, infrastructure necessities, machinery requirements, manpower needs, packaging and transportation requirements, and more. In addition to the operational aspects, the report also provides in-depth insights into PVC leather cloth manufacturing process, project economics, encompassing vital aspects such as capital investments, project funding, operating expenses, income and expenditure projections, fixed and variable costs, direct and indirect expenses, expected ROI, net present value (NPV), profit and loss account, and thorough financial analysis, among other crucial metrics. With this comprehensive roadmap, entrepreneurs and stakeholders can make informed decisions and venture into a successful PVC leather cloth manufacturing unit. Request for a Sample Report: https://www.imarcgroup.com/pvc-leather-cloth-manufacturing-plant-project-report/requestsample Customization Available: •Plant Location •Plant Capacity •Machinery- Automatic/ Semi-automatic/ Manual •List of Machinery Provider PVC leather cloth, commonly known as synthetic leather, is a material intended to substitute for leather in fields such as upholstery, clothing, and automotive applications. This material is crafted from polyvinyl chloride (PVC), a versatile plastic type that is easily molded into various textures and colors. The manufacturing process typically involves coating a base layer of fabric, such as cotton or polyester, with a blend of PVC and plasticizers, which then undergoes heat treatment to create a durable and flexible finish. Its significance lies in its ability to offer an affordable and ethical alternative to real leather, making it an important material in various industries. The benefits of PVC leather cloth include its cost-effectiveness, ease of maintenance, and resistance to water, stains, and wear and tear, which make it a practical choice for consumers. Moreover, it offers designers and manufacturers a high degree of versatility due to its availability in a wide range of finishes and colors. The global market is primarily driven by the increasing automotive and furniture industries, where PVC leather cloth is extensively used for upholstery. Additionally, the increasing adoption of synthetic leather in the production of affordable, stylish, and vegan accessories and garments further propels the market. Moreover, shifting trends towards sustainable and eco-friendly materials have led to innovations in PVC leather cloth production, including the development of eco-conscious varieties that minimize environmental impact, thereby creating a positive market outlook. Furthermore, continual advancements resulting in an enhanced quality and texture of PVC leather cloth is leading to a higher usage of the product in the production of leather alternatives, which is further impelling market growth. Apart from this, the market is significantly growing due to strategic collaborations with designers and brands that emphasize sustainability and innovation in their products. Concurrently, the rapid expansion of e-commerce platforms providing manufacturers with direct access to global consumers, while digital marketing strategies, including social media and influencer partnerships, are leading to enhanced brand visibility and consumer engagement, which is driving market growth. Some of the other factors contributing to market growth include the ongoing development of hybrid materials, the growing awareness of animal welfare issues, and extensive research and development (R&D) activities. title: Swissport Advances Sustainability Goals with New Electric Vehicles at Basel and Geneva Airports
description: Swissport is enhancing its sustainability efforts at Basel and Geneva airports with the delivery of new electric vehicles.The post Swissport Advances Sustainability Goals with New Electric Vehicles at Basel and Geneva Airports appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
content: Tuesday, May 28, 2024 Swissport is enhancing its sustainability efforts at Basel and Geneva airports with the delivery of new electric vehicles. Aligning with the Science-Based Targets initiative (SBTi), the company aims to meet short-term CO2 reduction goals and transition to net-zero carbon emissions by 2050. Swissport Basel is set to increase its electric ground support equipment (eGSE) to 49% by the end of 2024, thanks to new electric ground power units (eGPUs) and ongoing fleet modernization. Swissport Geneva, already operating with 53% electric vehicles, plans to expand its electric vehicle portfolio to 58% by the end of 2024. “As a leading provider of airport ground services in Switzerland, Swissport is fully committed to reducing CO2 emissions. With the introduction of new electric vehicles, we are accelerating our transition to more sustainable operations. This investment not only strengthens our fleet, but also underscores our pivotal role in the ecological transformation of the airline industry,” says Bruno Stefani, CEO of Swissport Switzerland, Italy and France. Swissport aims for 55% electric vehicles in its global fleet by 2032, targeting a 42% CO2 reduction from its operations (Scope 1 and Scope 2) compared to 2022 levels. The company prioritizes investing in electric ground support equipment (eGSE) and only purchases fossil-fueled models when no alternatives are available. eGSE has already become standard for many types of equipment. Over the next three years, Swissport plans to make 80% of all new motorized GSE acquisitions and replacements electric, investing over a billion euros in electric vehicles and equipment over the next decade. As a global leader in airport ground services and air cargo handling, Swissport operates at 286 airports in 44 countries. The company collaborates closely with aviation partners to promote sustainable aviation, including developing robust and efficient recharging infrastructure for vehicles like baggage tractors, aircraft tractors, transport vehicles, and passenger staircases. In 2023, Swissport provided top-tier airport ground services for approximately 232 million airline passengers (up from 186 million in 2022) and handled about 4.7 million tons of air freight (compared to 4.8 million in 2022) at 115 air cargo centers worldwide. Several warehouses have been certified for pharmaceutical logistics by IATA’s CEIV Pharma and the British MHRA. At the end of December 2023, Swissport, with around 60,000 employees, was active at 286 airports in 44 countries across six continents.

In response to the report, Hong Kyung’s agency management mmm stated, “[Hong Kyung] has received an offer to star in... Continue reading Sol Kyung Gu Reported + Hong Kyung In Talks For New Film By “Kill Boksoon” DirectorThe post Sol Kyung Gu Reported + Hong Kyung In Talks For New Film By “Kill Boksoon” Director first appeared on Soompi.
content: Sol Kyung Gu and Hong Kyung may be uniting in a new film! On May 27, Ilgan Sports reported that Sol Kyung Gu and Hong Kyung will star in the new film “Good_News” (literal title). In response to the report, Hong Kyung’s agency management mmm stated, “[Hong Kyung] has received an offer to star in the film and is reviewing the offer.” Sol Kyung Gu’s agency has yet to comment on the matter. The film “Good_News” is a modern-day historical drama inspired by a plane crash incident and is scheduled to start filming in August. If Sol Kyung Gu confirms his role, it will mark the fourth collaboration between Director Byun Sung Hyun and Sol Kyung Gu. Their partnership began with “The Merciless,” followed by “ Kingmaker: The Fox of the Election ” and “Kill Boksoon.” Hong Kyung is a rising actor who has received attention for his roles in productions including “D.P.,” “ Weak Hero Class 1 ,” “Revenant,” and “ Troll Factory .” Stay tuned for updates! While waiting, watch “Kingmaker: The Fox of the Election”: Watch Now And “Weak Hero Class 1”: Watch Now Source ( 1 ) ( 2 ) Sol Kyung Gu Photo Credit: C-JeS Studios Hong Kyung Photo Credit: management mmm

title: വാട്‌സാപ്പിനെ അധികം നമ്പല്ലേ; നമ്മൾ ഉറങ്ങുമ്പോൾ വിവരം കടത്തും
description: ടെ‌സ്ലയുടെയുടെ സിഇഒ എലോൺ മസ്ക് അടുത്തിടെ തന്റെ എക്സ് പേജിൽ പങ്കുവച്ച ചില വിവരങ്ങളാണ് ഇപ്പോൾ സോഷ്യൽ മീഡിയയിൽ ചർച്ചയാകുന്നത്.
content: ടെ‌സ്ലയുടെയുടെ സിഇഒ എലോൺ മസ്ക് അടുത്തിടെ തന്റെ എക്സ് പേജിൽ പങ്കുവച്ച ചില വിവരങ്ങളാണ് ഇപ്പോൾ സോഷ്യൽ മീഡിയയിൽ ചർച്ചയാകുന്നത്. വാട്‌സാപ്പ് ഉപയോക്താക്കളുടെ സ്വകാര്യ വിവരങ്ങൾ കടത്തുന്നുവെന്നാണ് അദ്ദേഹം ആരോപിച്ചത്. 'ചിലർ ഇത് സുരക്ഷിതമാണെന്ന് കരുതുന്നു. എന്നാൽ എല്ലാ ദിവസവും രാത്രി വാട്‌സാപ്പ് തന്റെ ഉപയോക്താക്കളുടെ വിവരങ്ങൾ കയറ്റുമതിചെയ്യുന്നുണ്ട്',​ എന്നാണ് അദ്ദേഹം എക്സിൽ കുറിച്ചത്. വാട്‌സാപ്പ് പുതിയ എ ഐ ഫീച്ചറുകൾ പുറത്തിറക്കാൻ ഒരുങ്ങിയിരിക്കെയാണ് മസ്കിന്റെ ആരോപണം. വാട്‌സാപ്പിൽ അയക്കുന്ന സന്ദേശങ്ങൾ നമ്മൾ അറിയാതെ കടത്തുന്നുവെന്നാണ് മസ്ക് പറയുന്നത്. മക്സിന്റെ എക്സ് പോസ്റ്റിന് പിന്നാലെ വാട്സ് ആപ്പ് ഉപഭോക്താക്കൾ വലിയ രീതിയിൽ ആശങ്ക പ്രകടിപ്പിക്കുന്നുണ്ട്. നിരവധി പേരാണ് കമന്റുമായി രംഗത്തെത്തുന്നത്. വാട്‌സാപ്പ് ഇങ്ങനെ സന്ദേശങ്ങൾ കടത്തുന്നതിന്റെ തെളിവ് കൂടി കാണിക്കാൻ കമ്പ്യൂട്ടർ പ്രോഗ്രാമറും വീഡിയോ ഗെയിം ഡെവലപ്പറുമായ ജോൺ കാർമാക് ആവശ്യപ്പെടുന്നുണ്ട്. Is there any evidence that the content of messages is ever scanned or transmitted? I assume usage patterns and routing metadata is collected, and if you invoke a bot in a conversation you are obviously opening it up, but I am still under the impression that the message contents... ഇന്ത്യക്കാരുടെ സ്വകാര്യവിവരങ്ങൾ കോടികൾക്കാണ് വാട്‌സാപ്പിന്റെ മാതൃകമ്പനിയായ മെറ്റ വിദേശത്തേക്ക് കടത്തുന്നതെന്നും ആരോപണം ഉയരുന്നുണ്ട്. സ്വകാര്യ വിവരങ്ങളുടെ സംരക്ഷണത്തിനായി ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്ന എൻഡ് ടു എൻഡ് എൻക്രിഷ്പൻ പേരിന് മാത്രമാണെന്ന് മുൻപും വാട്‌സാപ്പിനെതിരെ ആരോപണം ഉണ്ടായിട്ടുണ്ട്. എന്നാൽ വാട്സാപ്പിന്റെ ഹെഡായ വിൽ കാത്ത്കാർട്ട് മക്സിന്റെ ആരോപണത്തെ തള്ളി രംഗത്തെത്തിയിരുന്നു. വാട്‌സാപ്പിൽ അയക്കുന്ന സന്ദേശങ്ങൾ സുരക്ഷിതമാണെന്നും അവ വിദേശത്തേക്ക് കടത്തുന്നില്ലെന്നും അദ്ദേഹം വ്യക്തമാക്കി. പേര്, സ്ഥലം, വയസ് അടക്കമുള്ള വിവരങ്ങൾ സൈബർ അധോലോകമായ ഡാർക്ക് വെബിലും വിൽക്കും. വിവരങ്ങളിലൂടെ ഒരാളുടെ അഭിരുചി മനസിലാക്കി ഫേസ്ബുക്കിൽ പരസ്യങ്ങൾ കൊണ്ടുവന്ന് അതിലൂടെ വരുമാനം നേടാനും വാട്‌സാപ്പ് ശ്രമിക്കുന്നുണ്ടെന്നാണ് ആരോപണം. എന്നാൽ രഹസ്യസ്വഭാവമുള്ള ചാറ്റുകൾ കൂടുതൽ സുരക്ഷിതമാക്കാൻ വാട്‌സാപ്പ് അടുത്തിടെ ചാറ്റ്‌ലോക്ക് ഫീച്ചർ കൊണ്ടുവന്നിരുന്നു. ഓരോ സന്ദേശത്തിനും ഇഷ്ടമുള്ള നിറങ്ങളും പ്രമേയവും നൽകാവുന്ന ഫീച്ചറും വാട്‌സാപ്പ് പുറത്തിറക്കുമെന്നാണ് സൂചന. മെസെൻജറിലും ഇൻസ്​റ്റഗ്രാമിലും സമാനമായ ഫീച്ചറുണ്ട്. പരിചിതരുടെ ഫോട്ടോകൾ നൽകിയാൽ കൗതുകമുള്ള എ ഐ വീഡിയോകൾ സൃഷ്ടിക്കുന്ന സേവനം ഇറക്കാനും വാട്‌സാപ്പിന് പദ്ധതിയുണ്ട്.

title: നിങ്ങൾ അങ്ങനെ ചെയ്‌താൽ വരുമാനം വ‌ർദ്ധിക്കും, കൃത്യമായി ശമ്പളം ലഭിക്കും; കണ്ടക്‌ടർമാർക്ക് നിർദേശവുമായി ഗണേശ് കുമാർ
description: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: കെഎസ്ആർടിസി ജീവനക്കാരോട് നിർദേശങ്ങളുമായി ഗതാഗതമന്ത്രി ഗണേശ് കുമാർ‌. കെഎസ്ആർടിയുടെ വരുമാന വർദ്ധനവിനും മുന്നേറ്റത്തിനും.
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: കെഎസ്ആർടിസി ജീവനക്കാരോട് നിർദേശങ്ങളുമായി ഗതാഗതമന്ത്രി ഗണേശ് കുമാർ‌. കെഎസ്ആർടിയുടെ വരുമാന വർദ്ധനവിനും മുന്നേറ്റത്തിനും സഹായകരമാകുന്ന ചില നിർദേശങ്ങൾ എന്ന മുഖവുരയോടെയാണ് കെഎസ്ആർടിസിയുടെ ഔദ്യോഗിക ഫേസ്ബുക്ക് പേജിൽ വീഡിയോ സന്ദേശവുമായി ഗണേശ് എത്തിയത്. ''കെഎസ്ആർടിയുടെ വരുമാന വർദ്ധനവിനും മുന്നേറ്റത്തിനും സഹായകരമാകുന്ന ചില നിർദേശങ്ങളാണ് ഞാൻ മുന്നിൽ വയ്‌ക്കുന്നത്. കെഎസ്ആർടിസിയെ സംബന്ധിച്ച് യജമാനൻ യാത്രക്കാരാണ്. ഈ സന്ദേശം സ്വിഫ്‌റ്റിലേയും കെഎസ്ആർടിസിയിലേയും കണ്ടക്‌ടർമാരോടാണ്. ബസിൽ കയറുന്നവരോട് മര്യാദയുടെ ഭാഷയിൽ പെരുമാറണം. സ്ത്രീകളോടും കുട്ടികളോടും ഭിന്നശേഷിക്കാരോടുമെല്ലാം സ്നേഹത്തോടെ പെരുമാറണം. സ്ത്രീയും പുരുഷനും ഒരുമിച്ച് യാത്ര ചെയ്യുമ്പോൾ അവർ തമ്മിലുള്ള റിലേഷൻ എന്താണെന്ന് ചോദിക്കേണ്ട കാര്യം കണ്ടക്‌ടർക്കില്ല. അത്തരം ചോദ്യങ്ങൾ ചോദിക്കരുത്. മദ്യപിച്ചുകൊണ്ടും ഡ്യൂട്ടിക്ക് വരരുത്. രാത്രി 8 മണി കഴിഞ്ഞാൽ സ്ത്രീകൾ പറയുന്നിടത്ത് ബസ് നിറുത്തികൊടുക്കണം. അതിന്റെ പേരിൽ ഏതെങ്കിലും മേലുദ്യോഗസ്ഥൻ നിങ്ങൾക്കെതിരെ നടപടി എടുത്താൽ അയാൾക്കെതിരെ ഞാൻ നടപടിയെടുക്കും. റോഡിൽ നിന്ന് കൈകാണിക്കുന്ന എല്ലാവരെയും വണ്ടിയിൽ കയറ്റണം. സ്വിഫ്‌റ്റിലെ ജീവനക്കാരുടെ പെരുമാറ്റത്തെ കുറിച്ച് വളരെ മോശമായ അഭിപ്രായമാണ് കേൾക്കുന്നത്. ജനങ്ങളോട് മാന്യമായി പെരുമാറണം''. എനിക്ക് നിങ്ങളോട് ചിലത് പറയാനുണ്ട് ... കണ്ടക്ടർ വിഭാഗം ജീവനക്കാരോട് ഗതാഗത വകുപ്പ് മന്ത്രിക്ക് പറയാനുള്ളത് ... #KSRTC #CMD #KBGaneshKumar #TransportMinister #MinisterforTransport #socialmediacell #GovernmentOfKerala #ksrtcsocialmediacell എല്ലാ മാസവും ഒന്നാം തീയതി തന്നെ ജീവനക്കാർക്ക് ശമ്പളം ലഭിക്കാനുള്ള നടപടികൾ സ്വീകരിക്കുന്നുണ്ടെന്നും ഗതാഗതമന്ത്രി അറിയിച്ചു. കുറച്ചു മാസത്തിനുള്ളിൽ ഇത് ഉറപ്പായും നടപ്പാകുമെന്നും ഗണേശ് കുമാർ അറിയിച്ചു. മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി ഇക്കാര്യത്തിൽ എല്ലാ പിന്തുണയും നൽകിയിട്ടുണ്ടെന്നും, ഇതുമായി ബന്ധപ്പെട്ട യോഗം ഉടനെ മുഖ്യമന്ത്രിയുടെ അദ്ധ്യക്ഷതയിൽ ചേരുമെന്നും ഗണേശ് കുമാർ വ്യക്തമാക്കി.

title: Adieu to iconic Jan Shatabdi, Rajdhani express? Railway official drops sly hint
description: MUMBAI: Rajdhani Express is one of the premium services of Indian Railways connecting the national capital Delhi with various state capitals.
content: MUMBAI: Railway will soon launch sleeper coaches for Vande Bharat Express for long-distance journeys. The work is ongoing in the integral coach factory and it is rumored that the new train will mirror the same opulent interior of airlines. The train will come on par with the business class airline facility to provide peak travel comfort for passengers. Railway minister Ashwini Vaishnaw has shared the pictures of the new train coaches. The line-up consists of luxury coaches that can travel at a speed of 200 km. Sources inside railways confirm that the sleeper coaches of Vande Bharat will start service soon. Talks are also ongoing on whether to disband the iconic Jan Shatabdi Express and Rajdhani trains with the arrival of the new high-speed Vande Bharat services. There are also plans to extend the Vande Bharat services and connect them with the Vande metro project in Mumbai. Meanwhile, an unnamed railway official told Financial Express that the current Vande Bharat Express trains will replace the Shatabdi Express in a phased manner. Railway sources say that sleeper coaches of Vande Bharat are also likely to run as an alternative to the current Rajdhani Express. Rajdhani Express is one of the premium services of Indian Railways connecting the national capital Delhi with various state capitals. In an earlier interview granted to Financial Express, BG Mallya, General Manager of Chennai Integral Coach Factory, said that many of the schedules operated by the Vande Bharat Express are compatible with the Shatabdi Express. He also hinted at the possibility that Vande Bharat Express will replace the Janashatabdi services in the future. It is said that the Shatabdi Express will be considered for other routes in the future.

This growth is primarily driven by the increasing popularity of craft beer and technological advancements in hop processing. Hops, the flowers of the Humulus lupulus plant, are essential for imparting bitterness, aroma, and flavor to beer. Cultivated for centuries, hops contain alpha acids, beta acids, essential oils, and polyphenols, which contribute to their characteristic properties. Before brewing, hops undergo preparation processes such as pelletization or drying to enhance handling and storage. Craft beer, known for its diverse flavors and styles, significantly drives the hops market. Craft brewers experiment with various hop varieties to create unique flavor profiles, enhancing consumer appeal. As beer enthusiasts seek novel tastes, the demand for diverse hop options rises, fostering market growth. Craft breweries differentiate their products using specific hop blends, further boosting hop demand. title: Raonić: Po uzoru na sportski dio EBU organizovati i ostale segmente
description: Radio Televizija Crna Gora je kao članica Evropske radio difuzne unije (EBU), organizovala EBU sportsku skupštinu koja će se održavati danas i sjutra u Budvi. Osim aktuelnih tema iz svijeta sporta, biće riječi o tenderu za otkup TV prava za naredno svjetsko prvenstvo u fudbalu, trendovima u produkciji velikih sportskih takmičenja, finansijskom uticaju sportskih aktivnosti na rad javnih servisa.
content: A.M./B.B. SKUP U BUDVI Radio Televizija Crna Gora je kao članica Evropske radio difuzne unije (EBU), organizovala EBU sportsku skupštinu koja će se održavati danas i sjutra u Budvi. Osim aktuelnih tema iz svijeta sporta, biće riječi o tenderu za otkup TV prava za naredno svjetsko prvenstvo u fudbalu, trendovima u produkciji velikih sportskih takmičenja, finansijskom uticaju sportskih aktivnosti na rad javnih servisa. Generalni direktor javnog servisa Boris Raonić u uvodnom izlaganju je istakao da je siguran da će ova konferencija biti uspješna. "Srećan sam da vidim kako je efikasan ovaj sportski dio EBU i po uzoru na njega treba da se organizuju i ostali djelovi, posebno u dijelu tranzicije sa linearnih na nelinearne medije. Mi smo jedan od najmanjih javnih servisa u Evropi, ali neko ko ima mnogo stvari da podijeli sa ostalim servisima", kazao je Raonić. Raonić je otvorio 34. Sportsku skupštinu, koja ovoga puta broji 100 delegata. On je istakao da je za RTCG ovakav skup bitan, jer je to jedno veliko priznanje, pošto je domaćin još jednog skupa u Budvi popodne, okupljanja regionalnih javnih servisa. "Jedan je Skupština Evropske radiodifuzne unije, dakle, zajednica javnih servisa unutar evropskog kontinenta, koja je posvećena sportu. Drugi je kasnije popodne, okupljanje javnih servisa koji treba da uspostavljaju saradnju u regionu. U ovom novom vremenu digitalnih medija i uticaja digitalnih medija, trendovi su u tom pravcu vrlo jasni, a to je da sve više ljudi prelazi sa nelinarnih na linarne sadržaje. Bez umrežavanja javnih servisa bili bi ugroženi, pa je bliska saradnja bitna i evo danas ćemo razgovarati o sportu. Mi smo otkupili Olimpijadu za naredna dva olimpijska ciklusa, razgovaraćemo i o nekim drugim zajedničkim akcijama, poput Svjetskog prvenstva u fudbalu i nekih drugih, brojnih zajedničkih akcija. Bez zajedničkog nastupa na velikom i ozbiljnom tržištu na nivou svijeta, veoma ćemo se teško kao pojedinci izboriti, upravo zbog toga su ovi skupovi bitni i meni je drago da je ovo najveća skupština do sada organizirana ovog tipa", kazao je Raonić. Dodao je da je danas u Crnoj Gori više od sto članova javnih servisa sa teritorije Evrope i ponovo naglasio da bez tijesne saradnje, javni servisi će biti pregraženi od drugih globalih igrača. Što se tiče značaja održavanje konferencije u Crnoj Gori, raonić naglašava da izazovi slijede po pitanju ispunjavanja mjerila Ibara, i da fraza koja se godinama vrti u Crnoj Gori, da u Evropsku uniju ulazi kompletno društvo, ne samo pregovačke strukture je tačna, i ovo je jedan mali doprinos javnog servisa. "Zahvaljujući ovoj aktivnosti i sličnim aktivnostima, javni servis svojim gledaocima će ponuditi najkvalitetnije sadržaje. Danas govorimo o sportu, a naravno i svim ostalim sadržajima koji su od interesovanja za građane", naglasio je Raonić. Urednik sportske redakcije Televizije Crne Gore Dragiša Dedić je istakao da je Evropska radio-difuzna unija, osnovana 1993. godine, i da skoro nakon 40 godina Crna Gora je prvi put domaćin, organizator ovakvog skupa što je velika i satisfakcija i čast. "Stotinu gostiju iz gotovo svih javnih servisa iz regiona, iz Evrope, da vidimo, da uporedimo gdje smo mi u ovom trenutku u odnosu na njih. Ovo je, dakle, i skupština sportskih programa, kažem, javnih servisa iz regiona, iz Evrope, analiza događaja koji su bili, uglavnom velike sportskih događaja, posebno onih koji tek slijede, a to su Evropsko prvenstvo i Ljetnje olimpijske igre. Pričaćemo o produkcijskim, tehničkim, organizacijskim i novinarski, aspektima ovog programa. Mi nemamo toliko često pravo da organizujemo ta velika takmičenja, ali što se tiče naših reprezentativnih selekcija u svim sportovima i klupskih takmičenja, za nas je veoma važno da vidimo kako se to radi kod nas, da uporedimo kako to rade u regionu i u svijetu", istakao je Dedić.

title: Najveći izazov za članstvo u EU antievropske politike u strukturama vlasti
description: Predsjednik DPS Danijel Živković se sastao na radnom ručku sa ministrom saobraćaja Češke Martinom Kupkom koji boravi u Crnoj Gori. Tokom sastanka razmjenjeni su stavovi o političkim i društvenim procesima u kontekstu unutrašnjih, regionalnih, evropskih i geopolitičkih izazova, sa posebnim akcentom na proces evropskih integracija Crne Gore.
content: B.B. Živković - Kupka Predsjednik DPS Danijel Živković se sastao na radnom ručku sa ministrom saobraćaja Češke Martinom Kupkom koji boravi u Crnoj Gori. Tokom sastanka razmjenjeni su stavovi o političkim i društvenim procesima u kontekstu unutrašnjih, regionalnih, evropskih i geopolitičkih izazova, sa posebnim akcentom na proces evropskih integracija Crne Gore. Predsjednik DPS Danijel Živković je, kako navode u saopštenju, zahvalio Češkoj na posvećenosti i ekspertskoj i političkoj podršci koju je ta zemlja oduvijek pružala Crnoj Gori i upoznao češkog ministra sa budućim koracima u procesu integracija ka punopravnom članstvu Crne Gore u EU, ističući da najveći izazov može predstavljati prisustvo antievropskih politika u strukturama vlasti. Ministar Kupka je izrazio zadovoljstvo susretom i potvrdio dalju podršku Češke evropskom putu Crne Gore, ne samo kroz djelovanje u institucijama EU već i bilateralno kroz saradnju na razvojnim projektima koji su na dobrobit svih građana.

title: Braun: Nisam očekivao nagradu; Tejtun: Znali smo da se Indijana neće tako lako predati
description: Nakon susreta u Indijanapolisu, na konferenciji za medije govorili su Džejson Tejtum i Džejlen Braun, koji je ponio epitet MVP finala Istočne konferencije.
content: D.B. pres konferencija Nakon susreta u Indijanapolisu, na konferenciji za medije govorili su Džejson Tejtum i Džejlen Braun, koji je ponio epitet MVP finala Istočne konferencije. MVP finala Istočne konferencije Džejlen Braun nije očekivao da će dobiti to priznanje po završetku meča u Indijanapolisu. "Nisam očekivao nagradu, ništa u životu nisam osvojio i samo sam bio srećan što smo pobijedili. Naučili smo kako da se nosimo sa pritiskom iz iskustva proteklih sezona, izgubili smo u borbi za titulu, pa zatim i prošle sezone u finalu Konferencija i mislim da smo izvukli dobre pouke iz tih serija. Ove godine napravili smo male izmjene u mentalitetu i evo, već se vidi razlika." Govorio i o svojim liderskim sposobnostima. "Neki vokalni igrači našeg tima su otišli. Najviše mislim na svog brata Markusa Smarta i želio sam da popunim tu rupu u našem timu. Igrali smo na pravi način tokom čitave sezone, svi smo uložili velike napore i mislim da je ovo samo produkt našeg truda", rekao je Braun i dodao: "Drugačiji smo tim nego što smo bili prethodne sezone. Ljudi pričaju kako smo istali isti, a mi smo ozbiljno promijenili roster. Čak tri trenera u posljednjih pet sezona i sada, kada se sve sumira, mislim da smo mnogo iskusniji tim." Džejson Tejtun uzbuđen je zbog nove borbe za titulu. "Drago mi je što smo ponovo došli u situaciju da se borimo za titulu. To je specijalan osjećaj, nekima od nas je već poznat od ranije. Izvukli smo pouke iz prošlih neuspjeha i sada vjerujem da smo na dobrom putu da uzmemo trofej. Ove godine napravili smo izmjene u našoj igri, prošli smo pravi rolerkoster u plej-ofu i mislim da se već vidi razlika. Zahvalni smo što smo ponovo ovde", rekao je Tejtum. Pohvalio je i rivale. "Znali smo da se Indijana neće tako lako predati. Igrali smo protiv jedne veoma dobre ekipe, protiv koje smo bukvalno morali da zaradimo svaki poen i ovom prilikom želim da im čestitam."

title: Dragan Stojković odabrao za Evropsko prvenstvo
description: Selektor Srbije Dragan Stojković odabrao je 26 igrača za predstojeće Prvenstvo Evrope koje se održava u Njemačkoj od 14. juna do 14. jula.
content: D.B. konačan spisak Selektor Srbije Dragan Stojković odabrao je 26 igrača za predstojeće Prvenstvo Evrope koje se održava u Njemačkoj od 14. juna do 14. jula. Orlovi prvi meč igraju protiv Engleske, 16. juna u Gelzenkirhenu, potom slijedi duel sa Slovenijom, 20. juna u Minhenu, a grupnu fazu zatvaraju 25. juna kada je na programu duel sa Danskom, takođe u Minhenu. Spisak igrača: GOLMANI: Vanja Milinković Savić (Torino), Predrag Rajković (Majorka), Đorđe Petrović (Čelsi). ODBRANA: Strahinja Pavlović (RB Salcburg), Nikola Milenković (Fiorentina), Miloš Veljković (Verder Bremen), Srđan Babić (Spartak Moskva), Uroš Spajić (Crvena zvezda), Nemanja Stojić (TSC) SREDINA: Saša Lukić (Fulam), Nemanja Gudelj (Sevilja), Nemanja Maksimović (Hetafe), Ivan Ilić (Torino), Srđan Mijailović (Crvena zvezda), Sergej Milinković Savić (Al Hilal), Dušan Tadić (Fenerbahče), Lazar Samardžić (Udineze), Veljko Birmančević (Sparta Prag), Filip Kostić (Juventus), Filip Mladenović (Panatinaikos), Andrija Živković (PAOK), Mijat Gaćinović (AEK) NAPAD: Aleksandar Mitrović (Al Hilal), Dušan Vlahović (Juventus), Luka Jović (Milan), Petar Ratkov (RB Salcburg)

title: Australijski teniser crnogorskih korijena: Uz Miloša Raonića Crna Gora bi imala jaku reprezentaciju
description: Aleksandar Vukić je australijski teniser, malo ko zna da je cnogorskog porijekla, a u razgovoru za B92.sport osvrnuo se na svoj nastup na Rolan Garosu.
content: D.B. vukić ispao u prvom kolu Aleksandar Vukić je australijski teniser, malo ko zna da je cnogorskog porijekla, a u razgovoru za B92.sport osvrnuo se na svoj nastup na Rolan Garosu. Vukić je trenutno 89. na ATP listi, a u prvom kolu pariskog Grend slema poražen je od Kineza Džidžen Džanga sa 6:4, 4:6, 6:3, 7:5. "Razočaran sam, naravno da nisam presrećan posle poraza. Ovo je tenis, ne možete da dobijete svaki meč. Čestitam protivniku, zaslužio je da prođe. Imao sam solidnu sezonu na šljaci, nisam uspio da pobijedim i to je to", rekao je Vukić. Vukić je tokom susreta sa Džangom morao da traži medicinski tajm-aut. "U petak se to dogodilo, idem na magnetnu rezonancu, nadam se da nije previše strašno. Osjećam neku vrstu neprijatnosti. Aduktor je u pitanju, imam problem sa lateralnim kretnjama. Razmišljao sam o svim mogućnostima i šta može da se desi na meču. Pozitivno je što sam izdržao četiri seta. Mislio sam da možda neću biti u stanju da igram, nisam mogao da podignem nogu. Smatram da nije toliko strašno da će da utiče na nastup na Vimbldonu. Pričali smo prije meča, mislili smo da je rizik preveliki, nije meč pogoršao situaciju, tako da mislim da će to da bude okej za London i travu." Vukićev otac je iz Crne Gore, dok je majka iz Bosne i Hercegovine. Brat mu je rođen u Sarajevu, a on u Sidneju. "Moji roditelji su iz Crne Gore. Rođen sam i odrastao sam u Sidneju. Porodica sa očeve strane je odande, rođak je došao u Pariz da me podrži, bilo je lijepo što je tu. Bio sam blizu." Vukić razumije naš jezik, ali ga slabije govori. "Da, da znam. Pričam malo", rekao je na srpskom. Crna Gora bi imala zaista jaku reprezentaciju da su momci poput njega odlučili da igraju za taj nacionalni tim. Dotakao se i Miloša Raonića koji je takođe poreklom iz Crne Gore. "Tačno, možete da kažete to i za neke druge. To je na neki način bio san, bila bi dobra reprezentacija. Moj otac zna njegovog ujaka, nema mnogo ljudi u tom dijelu, išli su zajedno u školu ili tako nešto, tako da tako znam Miloša." Vukić pamti Rolan Garos i po trijumfu kad Karlosom Alkarasom u kvalifikacijama 2020. godine, kada je Španac bio još golobradi mladić. "Bio je oko 200. mjesta na rang listi, mlad, sa 16-17 godina. Igrali smo u prvom kolu kvalifikacija. Moglo je tad da se vidi da ima tu sirovu snagu, atleticizam, Ferero je bio tada tu. Bilo je mnogo oči koje su gledale, ne mene, već njega. Šalu na stranu, malo sam se opustio u nastavku meča i dobio. Igrao sam i protiv Sinera nekoliko puta. Postoji razlika između njih dvojice, nema mnogo igrača protiv kojih igraš i osjetiš tu veliku razliku u nivou. Obično je blizu i odluči nekoliko poena, ali takvi momci. Osjetiš da je drugačije", zaključio je Vukić. Vukićev najbolji plasman na listi bilo je 48. mjesto prošle sezone, nije osvojio do sada nijednu titulu, a u karijeri je zaradio malo više od 1,7 miliona dolara.

title: Đoković kreće u pohod ka odbrani titule
description: Pravi teniski spektakl očekuje se večeras na "Šatrijeu" kada se očekuje meč između najboljeg tenisera, Novaka Đokovića i domaćeg, iskusnog Pjera Ig-Erbera.
content: D.B. rolan garos Pravi teniski spektakl očekuje se večeras na "Šatrijeu" kada se očekuje meč između najboljeg tenisera, Novaka Đokovića i domaćeg, iskusnog Pjera Ig-Erbera. Njih dvojica se dugo poznaju a samo jednom su se ukrstili međusobno i to prije čak 11 godina. Bilo je to takođe u Parizu, ali sa druge strane grada, u dvorani "Bersi" kada je Đoković slavio u dva seta. "Malo me je sramota da kažem šta su moja očekivanja. Sve osim titule za mene nije zadovoljavajuće, tako je oduvijek bilo. Zvučaće arogantno, ali imam karijeru koja tome govori u prilog. Pokušavam da pišem istoriju, a Pariz je mjesto gdje se ona piše. Moja nadanja su uvijek takva, ali moram da spustim očekivanja, da ne razmišljam previše unaprijed, nego da idem dan po dan. Nisam igrao konstantno dobro duže vrijeme. Potrebno mi je to, da bih imao šansu da dođem do finala“, rekao je Đoković. Meč je zakazan za 20.15 časova i jedini je u večernjoj sesiji na "Šatrijeu".

title: Jokić postaje najplaćeniji igrač u istoji NBA lige
description: Nikola Jokić mogao bi da postane prvi igrač u istoriji NBA lige sa ugovorom od preko 400 miliona dolara.
content: D.B. obara sve rekorde Nikola Jokić mogao bi da postane prvi igrač u istoriji NBA lige sa ugovorom od preko 400 miliona dolara. NBA liga želi da uvede mogućnost povećanja budžeta za plate, jer će u narednom periodu dogovoriti saradnje sa medijskim kućama oko TV prava u vrijednosti od preko sedam milijardi dolara. To znači da bi klubovi u NBA ligi imali opciju da za plate izdvoje i mnogo više novca, pa bi, recimo, najplaćeniji igrač zarađivao 72 miliona dolara u prvoj godini ugovora, dok bi ta cifra do pete godine mogla da naraste i do 95 miliona po sezoni. Budući da Jokiću ističe ugovor sa Nagetsima 2028. godine, srpski centar mogao bi ujedno da postane i prvi superstar u NBA ligi da pređe tu magičnu cifru.

title: "Na Bilećkom jezeru moguće i solarne elektrane"
description: Valorizacija potencijala Bilećkog jezera pruža velike šanse i Crnoj Gori i Republici Srpskoj, kazao je predsjednik Odbora Elektroprivrede Crne Gore Milutin Đukanović. Istakao je da postoji mogućnost i solarnih elektrana na Bilećkom jezeru, te da je dogovoreno da se formira jednu radna grupu koja će odabrati najbolje ideje.
content: M.M. ĐUKANOVIĆ Valorizacija potencijala Bilećkog jezera pruža velike šanse i Crnoj Gori i Republici Srpskoj, kazao je predsjednik Odbora Elektroprivrede Crne Gore Milutin Đukanović. Istakao je da postoji mogućnost i solarnih elektrana na Bilećkom jezeru, te da je dogovoreno da se formira jednu radna grupu koja će odabrati najbolje ideje. Na jučerašnjem sastanku ministara energetike i rudarstava Crne Gore i Republike Srpske, Saše Mujovića i Petra Đokića kao i predstavnika dvije elektroprivrede, dogovoreno je da će se od tekuće 2024. godine isplaćivati naknada za Bilećko jezero, Opštini Nikšić, u iznosu od oko 600.000 eura. Predsjednik Odbora Elektroprivrede Crne Gore Milutin Đukanović gostujući u "Dobro jutro Crna Goro" na TVCG je kazao da je ovo samo početak valorizacije potencijala Bilećkog jezera. "Od 1994. godine niko iz Crne Gore ni imao ni jedan cent koristi od Bilećkog jezera. Ovo je samo početak valorizacije potencijala Bilećkog jezera i mi smo juče naišli na lijep susret sa predstavnicima vlade Republike Srpske i rukovodstvom elektroprivrede Republike Srpske i za taj dio smo se odmah dogovorili", istakao je Đukanović. Valorizacija tog potencijala, kaže Đukanović, pruža velike šanse i Crnoj Gori i Republici Srpskoj. "Postoji potencijal za izgradnju novih elektroenergetskih objekata kao i možda da se iskoristi eventualno i ta ideja da se riješi odnosno snabdjevanje čitave boke Kotorske", kazao je Đukanović. On je naglasio da postoji mogućnost i solarnih elektrana na Bilećkom jezeru, reverzibilne elektrane, te da je dogovoreno da se formira jednu radna grupu koja će odabrati najbolje ideje. Đukanović je naglasio da su projekti u oblasti energetike strateški i da njihova realizacija traje preko deset godina, ali da je važno da se definišu prave ideje. "Ima puno ideja i to nas ponekad razvlači i stvara kod nas nedoumicu i formiranje ove radne grupe u kojoj će biti uključeni predstavnici vlade i Republike Srpske i Crne Gore i predstavnici elektroprivreda će uraditi to da definišu koje su to najbolje ideje pa da se polako kreće u realizaciju", poručio je Đukanović.

title: 1 year after Joliet man went missing, police continue searching for man last seen in Streator
creator: Maribeth Wilson
description: It’s been more than a year since Amos D. Morgan, a 63-year-old Joliet man, was reported missing.
content: It’s been more than a year since Amos D. Morgan, a 63-year-old Joliet man, was reported missing. was reported missing by the Joliet Police Department on May 12 and was last seen in the Streator area on Sheriff’s Office Sgt. Investigator Josh McGrath said the investigation remains open and active. Morgan’s vehicle was found in the Otter Creek Township area about 6 p.m. May 25, 2023. He was last seen driving a tan 2005 Chevrolet Trailblazer. The vehicle was observed in a photograph in at 5:12 a.m. on May 10, 2023. Amos’ SUV was located along North 18th Road east of East 22nd Road and was reported to have been first seen at that location on May 11, 2023, police said. Police said in November, the vehicle appeared to be in a similar condition as described by his family. It was an older vehicle with various mechanical issues. The vehicle was processed by Illinois State Police Crime Scene Services. Police have not disclosed the items collected or found inside Morgan’s vehicle. McGrath said police have continued to conduct searches, reaching out to the Decatur Police Department during the course of the investigation to conduct recent searches with assistance also from Joliet Police Department, Illinois State Police Crime Scene Investigation Division and Volunteer Cadaver Dog handlers from St. Clair Special Emergency Services Association. “The searches were focused on locations Mr. Morgan had reportedly worked during the time he went missing,” he said. “The searches were not successful in providing any additional information that would aid this investigation at this time.” In November McGrath said four searches had been conducted. These searches included the uses of search and rescue dogs (bloodhound dog, general tracking dogs and cadaver dogs). Authorities performed ground searches coordinated by the La Salle County Emergency Management Agency and aerial searches from the La Salle County Sheriff’s Office, Grundy County Sheriff’s Office and Peru Fire and EMS. “The search locations were focused in the surrounding areas of where Amos’ vehicle had been located,” he said in November, adding searches had been conducted at residences and surrounding properties of Amos’ family members. Police said there are no further updates to provide at this time, but foul play has not been ruled out. If anyone has information on the whereabouts of Morgan, contact the La Salle County Sheriff’s Office at 815-433-2161 or the Joliet Police Department at 815-724-3100. The Joliet Police Department remains the lead agency in this investigation. The LaSalle County Sheriff’s Office continues to assist the Joliet Police Department with their missing person investigation regarding Amos Morgan.

title: Perugia, insediata in prefettura la cabina di coordinamento per il Pnrr: Gradone in prima linea
description: Nasce la cabina di regia per il Pnrr. Nella mattina di lunedì 27 maggio, la presidente del Consiglio dei ministri Giorgia Meloni, unitamente ai ministri dell'Interno, Matteo Piantedosi, e degli Affari Europei, il Sud, le Politiche di Coesione e il Pnrr, Raffaele Fitto, in video collegamento dalla Prefettura di Roma, sono state costituite le cabine di coordinamento (ai sensi del Dl 19/2024) finalizzate ad assicurare la massima efficacia nell'attuazione dei programmi e degli interventi stabiliti dal Pnrr in ambito provinciale. Riunione svoltasi simultaneamente in tutte le prefetture italiane. Alla cabina di coordinamento per la Provincia di Perugia, presieduta dal prefetto Armando Gradone, sono intervenuti Luca Federici, direttore del servizio Pnrr della Regione Umbria, Erika Borghesi, consigliere provinciale, Michele Toniaccini, presidente di Anci Umbria, Paola Severini, direttore della Ragioneria Territoriale dello Stato di Perugia, Giuseppe Lacava, direttore della Soprintendenza Archeologia, Belle arti e Paesaggio dell'Umbria, nonché Paolo Cencetti e Massimiliano Marinangeli, in rappresentanza, rispettivamente, dell'Ufficio scolastico regionale e del Provveditorato Interregionale per le opere pubbliche Toscana, Umbria e Marche. Un organismo che si pone nel quadro di una consolidata, sinergica collaborazione interistituzionale in materia di attuazione del Pnrr. La prossima riunione della cabina di regia è stata fissata per il 3 giugno, dove sarà esaminata la mappatura completa degli interventi in corso. Una fase che permetterà di rilevare eventuali criticità, di mettere in campo le azioni necessarie al loro superamento, di favorire lo sviluppo delle migliori sinergie tra le diverse amministrazioni ed i soggetti attuatori dei progetti presenti sul territorio, nonché di implementare l'attività di supporto agli enti locali.
content: .
