title: Slováci platia mobilmi a hodinkami častejšie ako Slovenky
creator: TASR
description: Muži v porovnaní so ženami viac nakupujú aj na internete. Platby mobilnými zariadeniami patria medzi najbezpečnejšie metódy, zdôraznil ombudsman klientov Home Credit Miroslav Zborovský.
content: Bratislava 28. mája (TASR) - Moderné spôsoby platenia pri nakupovaní využívajú na Slovensku častejšie muži ako ženy. Zatiaľ čo mobilom alebo inteligentnými hodinkami platí 20 % mužov, u žien je to 11 %. Muži z celkového objemu transakcií platobnou kartou urobia štvrtinu na internete, v prípade žien je to 16 %. Vyplýva to z údajov spoločnosti Home Credit za minulý rok. "Z roka na rok nám na Slovensku pribúda NFC platieb, teda bezkontaktných úhrad prostredníctvom smartfónov či inteligentných hodiniek a náramkov. Ja pritom zaujímavé, že takéto užívateľsky pohodlné platby, bez nutnosti vyberať z peňaženky platobnú kartu či nebodaj hotovosť, sú skôr doménou mužov," priblížil obchodný riaditeľ spoločnosti Marek Tomčík. Ide pritom o trend, ktorý trvá už niekoľko rokov. V roku 2022 bol tento pomer 14 % mužov a 7 % žien, v roku 2021 zase 9 % ku 4 %. Muži v porovnaní so ženami viac nakupujú aj na internete. Zo všetkých platieb kartou zrealizujú 24 % prostredníctvom internetu, kým u žien tvoria takéto platby 16 %. Muži tiež podľa štatistík výrazne častejšie nakupujú na splátky v kamenných predajniach. Z celkového objemu tvoria ich nákupy dve tretiny, na ženy ostáva jedna tretina. Platby mobilnými zariadeniami patria medzi najbezpečnejšie metódy, zdôraznil ombudsman klientov Home Credit Miroslav Zborovský. Transakcie cez mobil, napríklad pri platbe v online obchodoch, sú podľa neho bezpečnejšie ako cez počítač. Okrem nakupovania v obchodoch sa dá takto aj vyberať hotovosť z bankomatov, ktoré ponúkajú možnosť bezkontaktného výberu. "Kartu uloženú v mobile nie je možné skopírovať a vďaka potvrdzovaniu transakcií je platenie mimoriadne bezpečné. Aj tu však treba, samozrejme, dodržiavať bezpečnostné pravidlá. Nikdy nikomu nehovorte, ani neposielajte overovací kód, ktorý vám bol doručený na mobilný telefón. Taktiež si pozorne prečítajte obsah SMS správ so zaslaným kódom a uistite sa, že sa naozaj týka tej platobnej operácie, ktorú práve riešite," dodal Zborovský.

title: Гороскоп для всіх знаків зодіаку на 29 травня 2024 року
description: Середа, 29 травня 2024 - це 21 день місячного календаря. Спадаючий Місяць перебуває у знаку зодіаку Водолій.
content: 29 травня обіцяє бути насиченим днем, коли зірки сприятимуть вирішенню важливих питань і досягненню нових висот. Використовуйте цей час для саморозвитку, творчих починань і зміцнення відносин. Овен (21.03-19.04) Ваші лідерські якості завтра будуть на висоті. Це чудовий день для прийняття важливих рішень і реалізації амбіційних планів. Використовуйте свою енергію для досягнення поставлених цілей. Будьте готові до несподіваних можливостей, які можуть виникнути. Телець (20.04-20.05) Завтра буде сприятливий день для фінансових питань і матеріальних благ. Ваші зусилля і наполегливість принесуть плоди. Зосередьтеся на довгострокових планах і не бійтеся ризикувати, але будьте обережні та зважуйте всі рішення. Близнюки (21.05-21.06) Ваші комунікативні навички завтра допоможуть вам у вирішенні будь-яких завдань. Це чудовий день для налагодження нових зв'язків і зміцнення існуючих відносин. Можливі цікаві зустрічі та знайомства, які принесуть користь у майбутньому. Рак (22.06-22.07) Це день для внутрішнього спокою і гармонії. Приділіть час собі, займіться медитацією або іншими релаксаційними практиками. Ваше емоційне здоров'я завтра буде особливо важливе. Проведіть час з близькими людьми, насолоджуючись затишком і спокоєм. Лев (23.07-22.08) Ваше лідерство і харизма будуть у центрі уваги. Це ідеальний день для прояву своїх талантів і реалізації амбіційних планів. Не бійтеся демонструвати свої здібності – ваші зусилля знайдуть визнання та підтримку. Будьте готові до нових можливостей. Діва (23.08-22.09) Організація та планування будуть ключовими аспектами дня. Зосередьтеся на своїх цілях і завданнях. Ваше прагнення до порядку та увага до деталей допоможуть досягти успіху. Спробуйте знайти час для відпочинку і релаксації. Терези (23.09-22.10) Завтра буде сприятливий день для особистих відносин. Відкритий діалог і взаєморозуміння допоможуть зміцнити зв’язки з близькими людьми. Соціальна активність і культурні заходи принесуть багато позитивних емоцій. Насолоджуйтеся спілкуванням та новими знайомствами. Скорпіон (23.10-21.11) Фінансові питання вийдуть на перший план. Будьте уважні до деталей і аналізуйте всі можливості перед прийняттям рішень. Ваша інтуїція і рішучість допоможуть знайти оптимальні рішення. Відносини з близькими також потребуватимуть вашої уваги. Стрілець (22.11-21.12) Завтра буде сприятливий день для розширення горизонтів. Нові знання, подорожі або заняття улюбленими справами принесуть вам задоволення. Ваш оптимізм і енергія притягуватимуть нові можливості та цікаві знайомства. Не бійтеся експериментувати та відкривати для себе щось нове. Козеріг (22.12-19.01) Зосередьтеся на кар'єрі та професійному розвитку. Ваші наполегливість і старанність принесуть плоди. Важливо поставити перед собою конкретні цілі та працювати над їх досягненням. Не забувайте про відпочинок і баланс між роботою та особистим життям. Водолій (20.01-18.02) Завтра буде сприятливий день для соціальної активності та інновацій. Ваші ідеї та ініціативи знайдуть підтримку серед оточуючих. Відвідайте зустрічі з друзями, культурні заходи або займіться волонтерством. Ваша оригінальність і нестандартне мислення принесуть успіх. Риби (19.02-20.03) Завтра буде день для творчості та духовного розвитку. Займіться мистецтвом, медитацією або іншими духовними практиками. Ваша інтуїція буде на висоті, що допоможе знайти відповіді на важливі питання та досягти внутрішньої гармонії. Спілкування з однодумцями принесе натхнення та нові ідеї. Новини від Корреспондент.net в Telegram та WhatsApp. Підписуйтесь на наші канали https://t.me/korrespondentnet та WhatsApp

title: Апетитът на местните инвеститори за български ДЦК започва да се изчерпва
creator: Николай Стоянов <capital.nospam@capital.bg>
description: Служебният кабинет успя да си набави още 300 млн. лв. на проведения в понеделник аукцион на ДЦК, но при спадащ инвеститорски интерес и по-висока доходност. Резултатите от проведения от БНБ търг показват, че тригодишните книжа са пласирани при среднопретеглена доходност 3.21%, докато само месец по-рано при първото предлагане от същата емисия тя беше 3.01%. Но може би по ключово е, че подадените поръчки са били за едва 357 млн. лв., което дава коефициент на покритие от едва 1.19, докато при предиш...
content: Служебният кабинет успя да си набави още 300 млн. лв. на проведения в понеделник аукцион на ДЦК, но при спадащ инвеститорски интерес и по-висока доходност. от проведения от БНБ търг показват, че тригодишните книжа са пласирани при среднопретеглена доходност 3.21%, докато само месец по-рано при първото предлагане от същата емисия тя беше 3.01%. Но може би по ключово е, че подадените поръчки са били за едва 357 млн. лв., което дава коефициент на покритие от едва 1.19, докато при предишните два аукциона търсенето надвишаваше предлагането над два пъти. "За съжаление ентусиазмът от първите два аукциона бързо угасна и даде път на прагматизма и предпазливостта. Вял интерес от пазарните участници и респективно много по-ниско покритие. Политическата несигурност и неяснотата дали и след изборите ще продължи ударното емитиране на вътрешния пазар по-скоро прави големите институционални инвеститори внимателни наблюдатели на този пазар с оглед и на нелошите алтернативи като ДЦК на страни в региона със сходен рисков профил като България", коментира Мартин Търпанов, ръководител на отдел "Дългови инструменти" в "Делтасток". Почти само банки Друг важен момент е, че в голямата си част влошаването на постигнатата доходност идва отвън и всъщност спредовете спрямо аналогичните германски облигации се свива. При първото пласиране на емисията през април той беше 45 базисни пункта, докато сега е 39 базсини пункта, но самите германски тригодишни ДЦК се търгуват на по-високи нива. Няма и 10% от нужното "Числата в бюджета предполагат страната в един момент да излезе и на международните пазари с по-голяма емисия, което също допринася за предпазливостта на местните инвеститори и изискването на малко по-висока доходност. Задържането на бенчмарковите лихви на сравнително високи нива също не помага на емитента за постигане на по-добра цена на финансиране", обясни Търпанов. Априорно беше ясно, че такива количества са непосилни за вътрешния пазар и България ще излиза и с емисия еврооблигации. Задъхването на търсенето от местните инвеститори и изравняването на доходностите с тези по международните емсии може да наклони планирания миск във финансирането от МФ повече към външния пазар. Там страната има предимството да е приемана като рядък, слабо задлъжнял емитент с перспектива да влезе в еврозоната, което представлява добра добавка към портфейлите от дълг на развиващите се пазари. Засега все още няма публикуван емисионен календар за юни, от който да се види дали правителството планира да продължи с аукционите на вътрешния пазар. Етикети

title: Saint-Symphorien : un nouvel espace pour les producteurs
content: Jeudi 23 mai 2024, lors du marché de Saint-Symphorien, en partenariat avec l’association Parlons-en, les acheteurs ont pu découvrir un nouvel espace pour les artisans et producteurs. Les travaux, pris en charge par l’association, ont eu lieu dans la grange de Thierry Mouchard, de la ferme de la Solive. Cet aménagement était très important et primordial car les jours de mauvais temps certains artisans et commerçants étaient obligés de s’installer dehors. Certains soirs, le terrain était difficile mais maintenant tout le monde est au sec ! Par ailleurs, l’association organise une journée portes ouvertes le samedi 15 juin à la ferme de la Solive (Granzay Gript). L’après-midi, ce sera au tour du Gaec Graines d’Avenir, de Guillaume et Marc, les maraîchers de la commune, de se faire connaître. Ce jour-là, l’espace des Ouches accueillera de 9 h 30 à 19 h un marché de producteurs bio, des stands associatifs liés à l’environnement, ainsi que quelques artisans. Des jeux pour enfants, des animations musicales et une restauration diversifiée compléteront le programme.

title: Stars visit the Oilers with 2-1 series lead
creator: Canadian Press
description: Dallas Stars (52-21-9, first in the Central Division) vs. Edmonton Oilers (49-27-6, second in the Pacific Division) Edmonton, Alberta; Wednesday, 8:30 p.m.
content: Stars visit the Oilers with 2-1 series lead Dallas Stars (52-21-9, first in the Central Division) vs. Edmonton Oilers (49-27-6, second in the Pacific Division) Edmonton, Alberta; Wednesday, 8:30 p.m. Canadian Press May 28, 2024 1:11 AM May 28, 2024 1:20 AM Share by Email Share on Facebook Share on X Share on LinkedIn Print Share via Text Message Dallas Stars (52-21-9, first in the Central Division) vs. Edmonton Oilers (49-27-6, second in the Pacific Division) Edmonton, Alberta; Wednesday, 8:30 p.m. EDT BETMGM SPORTSBOOK : LINE Oilers -125, Stars +104; over/under is 6 STANLEY CUP SEMIFINALS: Stars lead series 2-1 BOTTOM LINE: The Dallas Stars visit the Edmonton Oilers in the third round of the NHL Playoffs with a 2-1 lead in the series. The teams meet Monday for the seventh time this season. The Stars won 5-3 in the last meeting. Jason Robertson led the Stars with three goals. Edmonton has a 49-27-6 record overall and a 32-11-5 record in home games. The Oilers have given up 236 goals while scoring 292 for a +56 scoring differential. Dallas is 52-21-9 overall and 32-11-5 in road games. The Stars have a +62 scoring differential, with 294 total goals scored and 232 allowed. TOP PERFORMERS: Zach Hyman has 54 goals and 23 assists for the Oilers. Evan Bouchard has scored four goals with nine assists over the past 10 games. Joe Pavelski has 27 goals and 40 assists for the Stars. Wyatt Johnston has five goals and three assists over the last 10 games. LAST 10 GAMES: Oilers: 5-5-0, averaging 3.1 goals, 5.5 assists, 3.7 penalties and 9.6 penalty minutes while giving up 2.8 goals per game. Stars: 7-1-2, averaging 3.4 goals, 5.7 assists, 2.6 penalties and 5.2 penalty minutes while giving up 2.3 goals per game. INJURIES: Oilers: None listed. Das hat der 61-Jährige kürzlich geschafft. Kärntens Landeshauptmann Peter Kaiser gratulierte zum Erfolg. RÜSTORF. Für sein letztes Reiseprojekt ist er in Österreich geblieben: „Damit ich nicht nur die große weite Welt,...
content: Verpasse nicht die neuesten Inhalte von diesem Profil: Melde dich an, um neue Inhalte von Profilen und Bezirken zu deinen hinzufügen zu können. RÜSTORF. Stutz ist ein Weltenbummler. 125 Länder hat der 61-jährige Wahlrüstorfer bereist und dabei 32 Mal die Erde umrundet. Für sein letztes Reiseprojekt ist er in Österreich geblieben: „Damit ich nicht nur die große weite Welt, sondern auch meine schöne Heimat noch besser kennenlerne, habe ich vor Jahren beschlossen, alle Gemeinden in Österreich zu besuchen. Oberösterreich, Salzburg, Burgenland und Kärnten sind schon fertig, die restlichen Bundesländer in Arbeit“, so Stutz, der jeden Gemeindebesuch – insgesamt 1.415 – mit einem Foto von ihm und der jeweiligen Ortstafel dokumentiert hat. Alle seine Reisen hat der Weltenbummler auf seiner eigenen Website „ “ dokumentiert. Den Link dazu hat Stutz dem Kärntner Landeshauptmann Peter Kaiser geschickt und der zeigte sich beeindruckt: „Mit dieser interessanten und lustigen Idee sowie akribischen Dokumentation kennt sich Gerald Stutz nun in unserem schönen Bundesland bestens aus", sagte Kaiser und wünschte dem Reisenden Durchhaltevermögen für alle weiteren Gemeinden. Melde Dich an, um diesen Inhalt mit «Gefällt mir» zu markieren. Alleine schon die neue Filiale an sich ist ein Grund, um den XXXLutz in Linz zu besuchen: Am Donnerstag, 23. Mai, eröffnet neben dem Blau-Weiß-Linz-Stadion an der unteren Donaulände das wohl modernste XXXL Möbelhaus Europas, welches mit einer Verkaufsfläche von mehr als 24.000 m2 neue Maßstäbe setzt. Gerade die Fassade ist dabei ein echter Eyecatcher und wird mit einem ganz neuen LED-Beleuchtungskonzept in Szene gesetzt. Aber auch innen weiß der neue XXXLutz zu beeindrucken: „Im XXXLutz... Du möchtest zur Diskussion beitragen? Melde Dich an, um Kommentare zu verfassen. Werde

title: İmamoğlu'ndan AKP'li Sultangazi Belediye Başkanı'na Tebrik Ziyareti
description: İstanbul Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Ekrem İmamoğlu, Sultangazi Belediye Başkanı Abdurrahman Dursun'u tebrik ziyaretinde bulundu. İmamoğlu, paylaşımcı ve uzlaşmacı belediyecilik anlayışının önemine vurgu yaparak, "Seçimin ardından belediyecilik hizmetlerinin öne çıktığı ve hep birlikte görev yaptığımız bir dönemi arzuluyoruz." dedi.
content: İstanbul Büyükşehir Belediye (İBB) Başkanı , Belediye Başkanı Abdurrahman Dursun’a tebrik ziyaretinde bulundu. , “Paylaşımcı, uzlaşmacı, koordine olan belediyecilik anlayışının fayda vereceği tek şey var; milletimiz ve şehirlerimiz. Bu bağlamda seçimin geride kaldığı, artık belediyecilik hizmetlerinin önde koştuğu ve hep beraber görev yaptığımız bir dönemi arzu ediyoruz. Bu konuda hiçbir ilçemize bakışımız farklı değil, olmamalı, olmayacak” dedi. İBB Başkanı Ekrem İmamoğlu, ikinci kez aynı göreve seçilen Sultangazi Belediye Başkanı Abdurrahman Dursun’u makamında tebrik etti. Dursun ve ekibine yeni dönemde başarılar dileyen İmamoğlu, “Bu döneminde Sultangazi ilçemize iyi hizmetler sunmasını, bir önceki döneminden çok daha iyi hizmetlere kavuşması önemli bir dilektir. Her yerde söylüyorum; İstanbul'da her ilçe belediye başkanının çok başarılı olması, İstanbul'un başarılı olmasıyla paralel. Biz, bu duyguyla hareket ederek, bütün ilçelerimizi tek tek geziyoruz. Bugün de sizi ziyarete geldik” dedi. Temel amaçlarının, her ilçenin sorunlarını yerinde tespit etmek ve bu problemleri çözerek takip etmek olduğuna vurgu yapan İmamoğlu, “Günün sonunda, bizim 5 yıllık stratejik planımızı birlikte yazalım istiyoruz. Bugün burada yapacağımız toplantıların oluşturacağı altyapı, meclise taşıyacağımız 5 yıllık stratejik planın da 39 ilçede olgunlaşmasını sağlayacaktır. Bu alanda bu paylaşımcı,, uzlaşmacı, koordine olan belediyecilik anlayışının fayda vereceği tek şey var; milletimiz ve şehirlerimiz. Bu bağlamda seçimin geride kaldığı, artık belediyecilik hizmetlerinin önde koştuğu ve hep beraber görev yaptığımız bir dönemi arzu ediyoruz. Bu konuda hiçbir ilçemize bakışımız farklı değil, olmamalı, olmayacak” diye konuştu. İBB ve ilçe belediyelerinin koordineli, birbirinden haberdar olan, birlikte hizmet noktasında kabiliyetli davranan yerel yönetim sürecini başarma sorumluluğu olduğuna dikkat çeken İmamoğlu, “İnşallah milletimizin bize vermiş olduğu, güçlü bir mesaj olduğunu düşündüğüm, ‘birlikte oturun, birlikte çalışın’ mesajını hep beraber, en iyi şekilde uygularız. Bu, en itibarlı yolculuktur diye düşünüyorum. Bu manada, bugün tekrar yeni dönemimizde, Abdurrahman Başkanımıza üstün başarılar dilerken, bütün İstanbul'umuzda da başarılı bir hizmet dönemini hep birlikte yaşarız” ifadelerini kullandı. Sultangazi Belediye Başkanı Dursun da “Tebrik ediyoruz. Başarılar diliyoruz. İstanbul, hizmeti her zaman hak eden bir şehir. Hep beraber inşallah bu güzel şehre hizmet etmeye devam ederiz. Hayırlı uğurlu olsun. Rabb'im bahtınızı açık etsin. Ayaklarınıza sağlık. İnşallah güzel bir 5 yılı, hep beraber geçiririz” dedi. Konuşmaların ardından İmamoğlu ve Dursun, kurum kurmaylarının karşılıklı katılımıyla, Sultangazi’nin sorunlarına ve çözüm yollarına dönük ortak masa toplantısı gerçekleştirdi.

title: Elon Musk's xAI raises $6 billion to develop AI products
description: The Tesla and SpaceX CEO's company announced new funding this week.
content: The Tesla and SpaceX CEO's company announced new funding this week. Elon Musk's xAI will get $6 billion (€5.5 billion) from investors to fund the development of artificial intelligence (AI) products, the company said. The new funding will be used to bring the AI company's first products to market, build infrastructure and accelerate the research of future technologies. "xAI will continue on this steep trajectory of progress over the coming months, with multiple exciting technology updates and products soon to be announced," the company said over the weekend. xAI said it has made "significant strides" during the past year in developing the technology, which will continue in the coming months. Investors in the latest round include Andreessen Horowitz, Sequoia Capital, Fidelity Management & Research, Valor Equity Partners, Vy Capital, Saudi Prince Alwaleed Bin Talal and Kingdom Holding. Musk wrote on the social media site X that before the investment that xAI had a valuation of $18 billion (€16.5 billion). The funding should help Musk's company compete in a race to develop AI against Microsoft and Open AI, which created Chat GPT. Musk unveiled the new company in July last year and released its AI chatbot called Grok in November.

title: Ottieni una rasatura perfetta con Philips OneBlade 360, oggi a SOLI 38€
creator: Marco Silvestri
description: Il rasoio elettrico Philips OneBlade 360 Face, ora disponibile su Amazon a un prezzo speciale di 37,99€ anziché 58,99€, integra la rivoluzionaria tecnologia OneBlade per una rasatura...
content: Il rasoio elettrico Philips OneBlade 360 Face, ora disponibile su Amazon a un prezzo speciale di 37,99€ anziché 58,99€ , integra la rivoluzionaria tecnologia OneBlade per una rasatura estremamente rapida e confortevole , anche sui peli più lunghi. La lama 360 si flette in tutte le direzioni, offrendo un controllo senza precedenti e la capacità di rifinire e radere facilmente anche le zone più difficili da raggiungere. Il Philips OneBlade 360 è progettato per tagliare la barba, non la pelle, grazie anche al pettine regolabile 5 in 1 incluso . Grazie alla sua impugnatura compatta e alla possibilità di utilizzo sia su pelle bagnata che asciutta , diventerà il vostro miglior alleato di grooming, ovunque vi troviate. Philips OneBlade 360 Face, chi dovrebbe acquistarlo? title: Siete muertos en nuevos bombardeos israelíes contra un campo de desplazados en Rafa
description: Al menos siete palestinos han muerto y varios han resultado heridos este martes tras nuevos bombardeos del Ejército de Israel contra el campo de desplazados del [...]
content: Al menos siete palestinos han muerto y varios han resultado heridos este martes tras nuevos bombardeos del Ejército de Israel contra el campo de desplazados del barrio de Tal al Sultán , situado en la ciudad de Rafa, en el sur de la Franja de Gaza , tan solo un día después de que las fuerzas israelíes matasen al menos a 45 personas en un ataque similar contra el campamento de desplazados de Barakasat, en la misma zona. La mayoría de las víctimas mortales pertenecían a una misma familia y fallecieron al ser alcanzadas por un proyectil que cayó sobre su tienda de campaña en el campo de desplazados, situado en el oeste de Rafa, según informaciones de la agencia palestina de noticias WAFA, que apuntan a que el campamento se encuentra situado en las inmediaciones de una sede de la Agencia de Naciones Unidas para los Refugiados de Palestina en Oriente Próximo (UNRWA). Posteriormente, al menos un palestino ha muerto en otro ataque perpetrado contra el Hospital Indonesio , en la misma ciudad. Mientras, en el centro de la Franja de Gaza se han registrado bombardeos, que también se han saldado con varias víctimas mortales. El ataque perpetrado el lunes contra el campamento de Barakasat ha despertado una oleada de críticas y condenas a nivel internacional y ha llevado al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a convocar para este mismo martes una reunión de emergencia a petición de Argelia para abordar la situación. El Ejército de Israel confirmó entonces el bombardeo y señaló que logró neutralizar a dos altos cargos de Hamás , si bien reconoció que «como consecuencia del ataque y un incendio desatado a posteriori en la zona varias personas resultaron heridas». Así, ha afirmado que se está «revisando» el incidente. Israel comenzó una ofensiva contra la Franja de Gaza a raíz de los ataques de Hamás, que se saldaron con 1.200 muertos y 240 rehenes. Desde entonces, las autoridades gazatíes han notificado la muerte de más de 36.000 palestinos , a los que se suman más de 510 en Cisjordania y en Jerusalén Este como consecuencia de las acciones de las fuerzas de seguridad y los ataques de colonos israelíes. title: La Cina raccoglie fondi per la produzione domestica di chip dopo i nuovi blocchi di EU e USA
description: USA ed EU stanno spingendo per una produzione interna di chip, bloccando anche la vendita di attrezzature alla Cina. La nazione asiatica deve quindi rispondere con una raccolta di fondi.
content: Stati Uniti e Unione Europea stanno cercando di rafforzare le produzione domestica di chip con nuove legislazioni e grandi investimenti, con anche una serie di restrizioni alla vendita di chip e strumenti di fascia alta in Cina , come ben sappiamo. Non sorprenderà quindi che è arrivata a stretto giro una risposta della nazione asiatica. Secondo quanto riportato da Reuters, il China Integrated Circuit Industry Investment Fund, sostenuto dallo Stato, ha dichiarato di aver raccolto fondi per 344 miliardi di yuan (poco meno di 44 milioni di euro), che saranno utilizzati per promuovere lo sviluppo e raggiungere l'autosufficienza dell'industria cinese dei chip. Il Ministero delle Finanze cinese è il maggior contribuente del fondo con una quota del 17%, mentre la China Development Bank Capital è il secondo azionista con una quota del 10,5%. Il resto del fondo è composto da altri diciassette contribuenti, tra cui cinque grandi banche cinesi. Questa è in realtà la terza fase di finanziamento di quello che è conosciuto localmente come il "Grande Fondo". Il primo round del 2014 ha raccolto circa €20 miliardi, mentre il secondo round ha raccolto circa €28 miliardi nel 2019. La terza fase deve però essere applicata in modo più rapido in seguito all'intensificarsi di una serie di sanzioni e divieti sulla vendita di chip e attrezzature alla Cina. Reuters riporta che la terza fase degli investimenti del " Grande Fondo " si concentrerà sullo sviluppo di attrezzature utilizzate per la produzione di chip. Come sapevamo inoltre, la Cina si prepara ad abbandonare i chip Intel e AMD .

title: Yolanda Díaz exige un debate en el Congreso sobre el envío de armas a Ucrania
description: La vicepresidenta segunda y líder de Sumar, Yolanda Díaz, ha acusado al ala socialista del Gobierno de actuar «con falta de lealtad» hacia su socio de [...]
content: La vicepresidenta segunda y líder de Sumar , Yolanda Díaz, ha acusado al ala socialista del Gobierno de actuar «con falta de lealtad» hacia su socio de coalición con su «opacidad» por el envío de armas a Ucrania y ha exigido que deje de «actuar en solitario» y no impida el debate sobre esta medida en el Congreso. En declaraciones a TVE, recogidas por Europa Press, ha subrayado que la falta de transparencia con la que ha operado el PSOE en este asunto es «muy grave», dado que en dos ocasiones Sumar presentó en el seno del Gobierno observaciones sobre el destino de los 1.130 millones de gasto militar aprobado en abril y «no se le contestó», hasta que ayer conoció por la prensa de que el destino era armas para Ucrania. « Es muy grave por una falta de lealtad con el socio de gobierno, pero es más grave por la falta de lealtad con los españoles . La política de defensa es muy importante en el país y la ciudadanía tiene derecho a que exista un debate público sobre si este proceder es correcto o no», ha enfatizado Díaz. Rebate a Sánchez: Esto se debe debatir en el Congreso Así, ha rechazado el argumento del presidente del Gobierno, Pedro Sánchez, de no llevar el acuerdo bilateral con su homólogo ucraniano, Volodímir Zelenski , al ser un memorándum de entendimiento. Concretamente, Díaz ha sentenciado que ese envío implica cantidades «elevadísimas» en un contexto sin nuevos Presupuestos Generales, por lo que el PSOE debe recapacitar y hacer este debate democrático para que los grupos se pronuncien. Cuestionada sobre si va a hablar con el presidente del Gobierno para expresarle su malestar, la líder de Sumar ha señalado que siempre actuará con discreción sobre sus conversaciones con Sánchez , para insistir en su formación ya manifestó su postura crítica sobre la aprobación de ese gasto militar en abril, que se efectuó con «total opacidad». «La política de defensa española que tiene que estar sometida democráticamente al debate del Congreso para que lo conozca la ciudadanía, pero que para también, lógicamente, en una democracia, los partidos políticos tienen que opinar», ha zanjado. title: Terdakwa Kasus BTS Sadikin Rusli Minta Ditahan di Jatim agar Dekat Cucu
description: Sadikin Rusli sekaligus mengaku tidak sanggup membacakan seluruh nota pembelaan atau pleidoi pribadinya dalam kasus korupsi proyek BTS 4G pada Bakti Kominfo.
content: Terdakwa Kasus BTS Sadikin Rusli Minta Ditahan di Jatim agar Dekat Cucu Mulia Budi - detikNews Selasa, 28 Mei 2024 15:11 WIB Sadikin Rusli saat membacakan pleidoi terkait kasus korupsi BTS Kominfo (Mulia/detikcom) Jakarta - Perantara bernama Sadikin Rusli sekaligus orang kepercayaan mantan anggota III Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan (BPK) Achsanul Qosasi mengaku tidak sanggup membacakan seluruh nota pembelaan atau pleidoi pribadinya dalam kasus korupsi proyek BTS 4G pada Bakti Kominfo . Sadikin mengaku berat hati membacakan keseluruhan pleidoi tersebut dalam persidangan. "Sebenarnya saya sudah menyiapkan pembelaan pribadi dan rencananya akan saya bacakan pada kesempatan ini. Namun tadi pagi saya baca kembali rasanya saya menjadi tidak sanggup untuk membacakan," kata Sadikin Rusli dalam persidangan di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Selasa (28/5/2024). Baca juga: Achsanul Qosasi Ngaku Khilaf Terima Duit Rp 40 M, Ungkit Bintang Jasa Sadikin mengungkap alasannya tak kuat dan takut tak sanggup membaca pleidoi pribadinya. Dia mengaku ada permintaan dari cucu untuk segera pulang. ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT "Ada bagian yang menceritakan permintaan cucu saya agar saya segera pulang, saya takut tak dapat menahan air mata, takut tak dapat menyelesaikan pembacaan pleidoi pribadi saya. Karena ini, saya mohon diperbolehkan untuk menyerahkan saja dan dianggap dibacakan. Berat rasanya hati saya jika cucu sudah meminta agar saya segera pulang," ujarnya. Dia mengaku menyesali perbuatannya. Sadikin mengatakan hanya berniat membantu teman baiknya, yakni Achsanul Qosasi. ADVERTISEMENT "Saya sangat menyesali apa yang terjadi, meski niat saya hanya semata mengiyakan permintaan sahabat saya. Saya sama sekali tidak tahu apa yang dilakukan sahabat saya, saya tidak paham hukum, saya mohon agar Bapak Hakim memberikan ampunan kepada saya," ujarnya. Lebih lanjut Sadikin memohon agar majelis hakim menjatuhkan hukuman penahanannya di Porong, Jawa Timur. Dia mengaku ingin dekat dengan cucu. "Jika Bapak Hakim memutuskan untuk menghukum saya, izinkan saya permintaan agar putusan nanti Bapak Hakim berkenan mencantumkan saya menjalani hukuman di Porong, Jawa Timur, agar saya bisa lebih dekat dengan cucu saya," ujarnya. Dituntut 4 Tahun Dalam kasus ini, Sadikin Rusli dituntut pidana penjara selama 4 tahun dan denda Rp 200 juta subsider 3 bulan kurungan. Jaksa menyakini Sadikin melanggar Pasal 12 huruf e UU Nomor 31 Tahun 1999 tentang Pemberantasan Tindak Pidana Korupsi juncto Pasal 56 butir kesatu KUHP. title: EFG kommentiert Julius-Bär-Gerüchte weiterhin nicht
creator: Agentur sda
description: Der Vermögensverwalter EFG International hat sich am Dienstag im Rahmen der 4-Monates-Zahlen erneut...
content: Dies gelte auch für das Gerücht, er sei ein Kandidat für den CEO-Posten bei Bär: «Ich bin seit über 20 Jahren für die EFG-Gruppe tätig, und ich habe einen ziemlich guten Job hier», so Pradelli an einer Telefonkonferenz. Julius Bär soll laut Nachrichtenagenturen ein Auge auf EFG geworfen haben. Die Bank habe in den letzten Wochen vorläufige Gespräche mit EFG über die Möglichkeit eines Zusammenschlusses geführt, schrieb die Nachrichtenagentur Bloomberg am Freitagabend. Laut Reuters sind diese Gespräche jedoch abgebrochen worden. Julius Bär und auch EFG hatten am Freitag keinen Kommentar abgegeben. Mit den ersten vier Monaten des Geschäftsjahres von EFG ist Pradelli mehr als zufrieden. «Wir hatten einen sehr guten Start ins Jahr», sagte er. In den ersten vier Monaten betrug der Neugeldzufluss den Angaben zufolge netto 3,6 Milliarden Franken. Die verwalteten Vermögen kamen derweil per Ende April bei 157,5 Milliarden Franken zu liegen - nach 142,2 Milliarden Ende 2023. Der Anstieg von 11 Prozent wurde mit den Nettoneugeldern, Wechselkursschwankungen und einem günstigen Marktumfeld begründet. Unter dem Strich habe der Reingewinn den Wert von 110 Millionen Franken übertroffen, teilte das Unternehmen weiter mit. Ein Vorjahreswert wurde in der Mitteilung zwar nicht genannt. Es wurde aber auf den Jahresgewinn 2023 von 303,2 Millionen verwiesen.

title: Ständerat will Bauen an lärmigen Strassen weiterhin stärker fördern
creator: Agentur sda
description: Der Ständerat will den Wohnungsbau in Gebieten mit übermässiger Lärmbelastung weiterhin stärker...
content: So sollen Wohnbauprojekte bei übermässigem Lärm prinzipiell dann bewilligungsfähig sein, wenn in der Wohnung eine kontrollierte Raumlüftung installiert wird oder wenn bei jeder Wohneinheit die Hälfte der lärmempfindlichen Räume über ein ruhiges Fenster verfügt. Dafür sprach sich der Ständerat am Dienstag aus. Auch ruhige Aussenräume spielen in der Fassung des Ständerats eine Rolle. Dieser bestätigte damit seine Haltung von Dezember 2023, als er das Gesetz ein erstes Mal beriet. Auch der Nationalrat will in Zeiten von Wohnungsnot den Wohnungsbau in Gebieten mit zu viel Lärm erleichtern. Er plädierte aber im März für einen Mittelweg zwischen dem weiter gehenden Vorschlag des Ständerats und der restriktiveren Vorlage des Bundesrats. Nun bleiben Differenzen zwischen den Räten.

title: Экспорт зерна из России уже на 10 млн тонн превысил прошлый сезон
content: Экспорт зерна из России превысил 60 млн т с начала сельскохозяйственного года – с 1 июля 2023 г. Об этом пишет «Интерфакс» со ссылкой на председателя правления Союза экспортеров зерна Эдуарда Зернина. «Сомнений в рекордном экспорте уже ни у кого не возникает», – сказал он. Зернин отметил, что текущий показатель превысил уровень прошлого сезона на 10 млн т. Кроме того, наблюдается опережение по пшенице более чем на 5 млн т. Столько же в текущем сезоне прибавили ячмень и кукуруза. Зернин также сообщил, что доля новых рынков стран Азии, Африки и Латинской Америки в поставках заметно выросла. По его словам, Россия заново открыла для себя рынок Индонезии, Марокко, Эритреи, а также значительно нарастила поставки в Китай. При этом доля стран Ближнего Востока и Северной Африки в поставках снизилась до 65% – до этого показатель был на уровне 80%. 26 марта в пресс-службе Минсельхоза России сообщили о распределении между экспортерами дополнительных тарифных квот на вывоз пшеницы, меслина, ячменя, ржи и кукурузы объемом около 107 467 т. Таким образом, завершилась первая часть выдачи допквот на 2,4 млн т. С 8 по 14 мая Минсельхоз РФ снизил пошлину на экспорт пшеницы и меслина до 3277,7 руб., а также установил нулевую пошлину на ячмень и кукурузу.

title: Tokat'ta Çam Ağacı Kaplı Dağ Oyuldu!
description: Tokat’taki Hüseyin Gazi köyünde yol yapımı için taş ocağı açıldı. Köylüler, yok edilen ormandaki ağaçların yetiştirilmesinin neredeyse olanaksız ve doğanın yüzlerce yıllık sabrını gerektirdiğini belirterek siyasilere çağrı yaptı.
content: ’ın Niksar ilçesinin Hüseyin Gazi köyünde yol yapımı için dolgu malzemesi kullanmak üzere açılan taş ocağı köylülerin tepkisine yol açtı. Çam ağaçlarıyla kaplı dağın oyularak doğaya, alanlarına ve bir adım ötede de tarihe tehdit oluşturduğunu söyleyen köylüler, siyasilerin bölgeye gelip durumu gözleriyle görmelerini talep ediyorlar. Köy halkından Hasbi Şahin, BirGün’e yaptığı açıklamada, “Taş ocağı için bir yok ediliyor” diyerek, yola karşı olmadıklarını ancak dolgu malzemelerinin farklı bölgelerden de sağlanabileceğini belirterek, karşı çıktıkları şeyin doğanın katledilmesi olduğunu söyledi. Taş ocağının yuttuğu alanlarda, taşların ve kayaların üzerinde oluşmuş bir çam ormanı bulunuyor. Bunların yok edildiğinde yerlerine yeni ağaçlar yetiştirilmesi neredeyse olanaksız ve doğanın yüzlerce yıllık sabrını gerektiriyor. Hüseyin Gazi köylüleri, doğanın katledilmemesi, tarım alanlarının ve tarihi değerlerin zarar görmemesi için siyasilerin bölgeye gelip durumu gözleriyle görmelerini talep ediyorlar. ​​​​​​​

title: Lok Sabha elections 2024 Phase 7: Last day of voting on June 1; full list of constituencies and key candidates here
description: Lok Sabha elections 2024 Phase 7: The final phase of Lok Sabha elections 2024 will be held on June 1, covering 57 constituencies across 8 states and UT. A total of 904 candidates are contesting from these constituencies.
content: Lok Sabha elections phase 7: The seventh and the final phase of the Lok Sabha elections 2024 will be held on June 1. During the seventh phase of pollin, voters from 57 Lok Sabha constituencies spread across eight states and UT will exercise their franchise. The voting will take place in Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab, Odisha, West Bengal, Jharkhand and Chandigarh. As many as 904 candidates are in the fray from these 57 Lok Sabha constituencies. Uttar Pradesh (13 seats) 1. Varanasi 2. Mahrajganj 3. Gorakhpur 4. Kushinagar 5. Deoria 6. Bansgaon 7. Ghosi 8. Ghazipur 9. Ballia 10. Salempur 11. Chandauli 12. Mirzapur 13. Robertsganj Punjab (all 13 seats) 1. Gurdaspur 2. Amritsar 3. Khadoor Sahib 4. Jalandhar (SC) 5. Hoshiarpur (SC) 6. Anandpur Sahib 7. Ludhiana 8. Fatehgarh Sahib (SC) 9. Faridkot (SC) 10. Firozpur 11. Bathinda 12. Sangrur 13. Patiala ats) 1. Arrah 2. Buxar 3. Karakat 4. Jahanabad 5. Nalanda 6. Patna Sahib 7. Pataliputra 8. Sasaram West Bengal (9 Seats) 1. Barasat 2. Basirhat 3. Diamond Harbour 4. Dum Dum 5. Jaynagar 6. Jadavpur 7. Kolkata Dakshin 8. Kolkata Uttar 9. Mathurapur Chandigarh 1. Chandigarh Himachal Pradesh (4 seats) 1. Mandi 2. Shimla 3. Kangra 4. Hamirpur Odisha (6 seats) 1. Balasore 2. Bhadrak 3. Jajpur 4. Jagatsinhpur 5. Kendrapara 6. Mayurbhanj Jharkhand (3 seats) 1. Dumka 2. Godda 3. Rajmahal 328 candidates from Punjab and 144 from Uttar Pradesh are in the fray for 13 seats each, respectively. 134 candidates are contesting on eight seats from Bihar, 66 from Odisha on six seats, 52 from Jharkhand on three seats, 37 from Himachal Pradesh on four seats and and 19 from Chandigarh for one seat. Key candidates in Lok Sabha polls phase 7 Varanasi has been the constituency of Prime Minister Narendra Modi since 2014. Congress party has fielded fielded from Varanasi for the third time. Rai was earlier part of BJP but quit in 2007. He began his journey with Congress in 2012 when he contested from Pindra (earlier known as Kolasla) and defeated a BJP candidate. The party then fielded him from Varanasi against the PM Narendra Modi. In the 2019 Lok Sabha election, Rai secured the third position. In Uttar Pradesh's Gorakhpur, BJP has fielded candidate politician and actor Ravi Kishan from the constituency. Samajwadi Party's candidate Kajal Nishad is contesting from this seat. In 2019 Lok sabha elections, Ravi Kishan had won from the seat with 60% and above votes while SP candidate Rambhual Nishad finished second and got 415,458 votes. This year, BJP has fielded actress Kangana Ranaut from Himachal Pradesh's Mandi seat. Kangana is contesting against Congress stronghold of Mandi against Vikramaditya Singh, the son of late former CM Virbhadra Singh. The Mandi constituency holds symbolic significance for the Congress, as it is considered a bastion of the Virbhadra family. The seat is currently held by Pratibha Devi Singh, the late leader's widow. She wrested the seat for the Congress in the bye-election that was held following the demise of then-BJP MP Ram Swaroop Sharma. In 2019 elections, the BJP had won all four Lok Sabha constituencies in the state. 3. Livemint tops charts as the fastest growing news website in the world to know more. You are on Mint! title: UK households can claim £170 refund on BBC TV licence fee
description: If you do not watch or record live TV, or stream BBC iPlayer you could be eligible for a £169.50 refund on your TV licence
content: Every household in the UK is legally required to have a TV licence in order to watch or record live TV, regardless of what channel it is on. However, you could be entitled to a refund on the cost of your TV Licence if you do not watch or record live TV, and don’t stream BBC iPlayer either. You can apply for a refund if you won’t need your licence again before it expires, and you have at least one complete month left on it, due to not watching or recording live TV. UK households could be eligible for a £159 refund on their TV licence costs (Image: PA) You can apply for a refund on your TV licence here . Refunds are usually processed and issued within 21 days of application. However, your refund may be delayed if you have to be contacted for more information. Any refund will be paid by cheque or a BACS transfer directly into your bank account. The amount you will be due in a refund will be worked out by TV Licensing , the organisation that issues TV licences. They explain how they work out the amount you will be due here: “Any refund due is calculated in unused months. You must have at least one complete month left on your licence that you won’t need before it expires. (function (d, s, n) { var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; js = d.createElement(s); js.className = n; js.src = "//player.ex.co/player/abffe1c9-94c2-4cb8-9e4b-edf636d234a3"; fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs); js.setAttribute('programmatic', 'true'); js.onload = function () { const playerApi231038 = ExCoPlayer.connect('abffe1c9-94c2-4cb8-9e4b-edf636d234a3'); playerApi231038.init({ "autoPlay": false, "mute": true, "showAds": true, "playbackMode": "play-in-view", "content": { "playFirst": [ { "title": "Changes in TV Licence Fees Over the Years", "src": "https://large-cdn.ex.co/transformations/production/968bde9d-468a-43a9-811e-ffc4dda6b78b/720p.mp4" } ], "playlistId": "649af81e79e0a90012add765" }, "sticky": { "mode": "persistent", "closeButton": true, "pauseOnClose": true, "desktop": { "enabled": false, "position": "bottom-right" }, "mobile": { "enabled": false, "position": "upper-small" } }}); }; }(document, 'script', 'exco-player')); “So, you could get a refund for between one and 11 months, depending on how long you have left on your licence. “You won’t be eligible for a refund if there is less than one month between the cancellation date and the expiry date. “If you haven’t paid for your licence in full, its expiry date may be changed to reflect what you’ve paid.” You do not need a TV Licence to watch: streaming services like Netflix and Disney Plus on-demand TV through services like All 4 and Amazon Prime Video videos on websites like YouTube videos or DVDs You do need a TV Licence if you: watch or record live TV on any channel or service use BBC iPlayer For those of us aged 75 or over who are in receipt of Pension Credit, the TV Licence can be obtained for free rather than costing £169.50. Guidance from TV Licensing says: “Free TV Licences are only available if you’re 75 or over and you, or your partner living at the same address, are receiving Pension Credit. “If you think you’re eligible for a free licence but can’t apply online, please call 0300 790 6117* and speak to one of our advisors to request an application form (our lines are open between 8.30am and 6.30pm, from Monday to Friday). “Once we’ve received your application it may take a few weeks to process. If there are any problems we’ll write to let you know. We may also call you if you have given us your phone number. “There are separate arrangements in place for over 75s on the Isle of Man, the Bailiwick of Jersey and the Bailiwick of Guernsey.”

title: Residents in area of Warrington win Postcode Lottery
description: SURELY there’s no better way to brighten a gloomy Tuesday than with a lottery win.
content: Old Hall residents have received some good news this morning. Those living in the WA5 1QT area have all won £1,000 if they were signed up to the Postcode Lottery. The People’s Postcode Lottery is a subscription lottery which aims to raise money for charities while also bringing cash prizes to homes across the UK. Prizes are announced every day of the month – with £30,000 jackpots and £1,000 prizes for 20 different postcodes every day. Players can sign up with their postcode and pay £12 per month with a chance to win when they are automatically entered into a draw. A minimum of 33 per cent from each ticket goes to charity and players have raised more than £950 million for over 9,000 charities and good causes since 2005.

title: Woman with £144k tattoos and body modification collection shows off new horns
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Katie-Ann Gupwell)
description: 'Dragon Girl' Amber Luke, also known as Australia's most tattooed woman, has spent thousands on tattooing her body - but now she's taken her look to a new extreme level thanks to body modification
content: A woman has taken her image to a new extreme level by inserting horns on her head. Australia's self-proclaimed "most tattooed woman" has hit the headlines a lot in the past due to her unique look. She was previously left without sight for a whopping three weeks after getting her eyeballs inked . Recently, she even had the "agonising" procedure done again. Amber Luke, known as "Dragon Girl" online, has splashed out an eye-watering £144,000 on tattoos and body modificaitons. But now she's revealed to her Instagram followers that she's mixed up her image even more, as she's had horn implants inserted. The blonde beauty shared a number of close-up snaps of the new facial additions online. When you look at her forehead you can see that two sections are highly raised to make horns above her eyes. You can also see the stitch marks where the skin as been tacked back together. Since she revealed her latest treatment, people have been asking lots of questions, though some didn't seem surprised by the move. It seems as though her fans are just really excited to follow her journey and see what she does next. READ NEXT: Gran showcases £25,000 tattoo collection by rocking bright bikini One person said: "I was wondering if you were ever gonna get horns! Perfect for you! Can't wait to see what's next. Making me wanna book my next mod seeing you get all this fun stuff recently." Another wrote: "Your look just keeps getting better and better! Saw you at chermside a few weeks ago and wanted to say hi but got shy." A third wrote: "Amazing. You continue to be such an inspiration." Meanwhile, a fourth commented: "Mega beautiful implants." Even though many were quick to praise her new look, some did have questions. It looks as though some may have never seen the body modification before. One asked: "I'm confused what exactly you had done???" Another also chirped in with: "What holds them in place under the skin?" It may seem an extreme look to some, but Amber boasts a huge following thanks to the thousands of people who love her creative look. Bold and beautiful – it's fair to say she lives a colourful life while under and away from the needle. She's spent thousands on transforming her look ( Image: @amberluke666/Instagram) Amber's fans seem to love the latest addition to her look ( Image: @amberluke666/Instagram) As well as her tattoo addiction, the 27-year-old model, from Brisbane, is also a big fan of body modification . She has stretched ears, a split tongue and dermals, which are piercings placed under the skin. To hone her look even further, Amber has splashed out on plastic surgery. She's braved a boob job and butt lift, as well as cosmetic procedures like lip filler. She opened up about her epic transformation previously, and said: "Pictured on the left – a girl; at that stage feeling lost – feeling disconnected from herself. Pictured right – a woman; at that stage feeling turmoil; although resilience radiates. "These two women had a choice. To be the person on the left and be miserably ignorant to my own wants and needs in life and was projecting hatred onto others - for the inner pain was too confrontational to stand. "Or be the woman on the right - someone who dominates their brain and emotions and embraces charismatic traits. I am someone who takes accountability and responsibility. "I am Amber Luke. You will either love it or f***in despise it." I'm a beauty lover and swear by these 6 Urban Decay products I've used for years

title: છરી અને તલવાર વડે હુમલો:મોરબીના ત્રાજપરમાં મિત્ર સાથે થયેલા ઝઘડાનું સમાધાન કરવા જતા મારામારી
description: મોરબીના ત્રાજપર વિસ્તારમાં આરોપીઓને યુવાનના મિત્ર સાથે ઝઘડો થયો હતો. જેથી સમાધાન બાબતે વાતચીત કરવા જતા સારું નહિ લાગતા ચાર ઇસમોએ મારામારી કરી છરી અને તલવાર વડે ઈજા કરી જાનથી મારી નાખવાની ધમકી આપ્યાની પોલીસ ફરિયાદ નોંધાવી છે. મોરબીના ત્રાજપર ગામમાં રહેતા રવિભાઈ વરાણીયાએ આરોપીઓ મનસુખ ઉર્ફે મચો વરાણીયા, હકાભાઇ અદગામા, કાનાભાઈ અદગામા અને ઉગાભાઇ અદગામાવાળા વિરુદ્ધ ફરિયાદ નોંધાવી છે. જેમાં જણાવ્યું છે કે મિત્ર ધરમશી ઉર્ફે લાલાનો ફોન આવ્યો અને જણાવ્યું કે તેને હકા તેમજ મચા સાથે માથાકૂટ થઇ છે. જેથી યુવાન ત્રાજપર ચોરા પાસે ગયો હતો. ત્યાં લાલો હતો અને હકા સાથે માથાકૂટ થયાની વાત કરતા મચાભાઈનો ફોન આવ્યો અને ત્રાજપર અવેળા પાસે બોલાવતા ફરિયાદી રવિભાઈ ત્યાં ગયો હતો. જ્યાં મનસુખ, હકાભાઇ, ઉગાભાઇ સહિતના હાજર હતા. ત્યારે ફરિયાદીએ મચાભાઈ અને હકાભાઇ સાથે લાલા સાથે ઝઘડો નહિ કરવા અંગે વાતચીત કરતો હોય ત્યારે આરોપીઓએ મારમારી કરી હતી. મોરબી સીટી બી ડીવીઝન પોલીસે ચારેય આરોપીઓ વિરુદ્ધ ગુનો નોંધી તપાસ ચલાવી છે.

title: Mobile Phone Taxes Removed? PTA Clarifies!
creator: Usama Anjum
description: Copyright protected content copied from PhoneWorld website.Pakistan Telecommunication Authority clarified that there has been no official decision to remove taxes on mobile phones in Pakistan.The post Mobile Phone Taxes Removed? PTA Clarifies! appeared first on PhoneWorld.
content: Recently, rumors were circulating on the web regarding the removal of PTA taxes on mobile phones. However, in a recent statement, the Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (PTA) clarified that there has been no official decision to remove taxes on mobile phones in Pakistan. Moreover, the national telecom regulator highlighted its role in verifying the technical standards of mobile phones for registration via after the payment of FBR taxes. It also clarified that the onus of implementing and collecting the mobile phone taxes lies with the Federal Board of Revenue, not the PTA. PTA also emphasized that non-PTA mobile users can temporarily register their mobile devices for 60 days while the relaxation for overseas Pakistanis is 120 days. Last year, the government launched a facility that enabled overseas Pakistanis to register their mobile phones tax-free through the Temporary Registration System for 120 days during each visit. This, however, is a temporary facility and does not illustrate a broader removal of FBR taxes on mobile phones. In addition, the telecom regulator advised the public to rely on official sources for updates to curb the spread of misinformation. It would lead to a decrease in the spread of fake news. For authentic updates on mobile taxes, citizens are urged to consult the FBR directly. PTA Taxes Portal Find PTA Taxes on All Phones on a Single Page using the PhoneWorld PTA Taxes Portal

title: Man City make decision on the future of Leeds target Kalvin Phillips
creator: Ahad Shaukat
description: Manchester City have made the decision to sell midfielder Kalvin Phillips in the summer transfer window. According to Football Insider, the Premier League champions have made up their mind to cut down on their losses and recoup some of the money they paid for the former Leeds United midfielder. The 28-year-old, who joined Pep Guardiola’s [...]The post Man City make decision on the future of Leeds target Kalvin Phillips appeared first on CaughtOffside.
content: According to , the Premier League champions have made up their mind to cut down on their losses and recoup some of the money they paid for the former Leeds United midfielder. The 28-year-old, who joined Pep Guardiola’s team in the summer of 2022, is two years into a six-year deal, and his future appears to be unresolved. He joined West Ham United on a loan deal in January but his move to the London Stadium has not worked. He made a number of high profile errors while playing for the Hammers and the fans did not approve of his performances during his time at the club. A permanent move to West Ham is unlikely for the midfielder. If Leeds United had got promoted to the Premier League, they would have targeted a move for their former player having received the financial backing of playing in the Premier League. However, they failed to get promoted after losing the Championship play-off final to Southampton. Another report from the revealed that the Premier League champions are looking to get £40million for the midfielder in the transfer window. His limited playing time during his spell at the Etihad Stadium has seen him lose his place in Gareth Southgate’s England team. Phillips was not included in the provisional England squad for the Euros announced by Southgate. Kalvin Phillips has struggled since joining Man City It is a huge decline in the career of the player, who was England’s Player of the year just a few years back. Leeds United will find it difficult to sign the fan favourite after failing to win their place back in the Premier League and Man City can now find it difficult to attract buyers for Phillips who would be willing to match their asking price. The midfielder’s future is uncertain and staying at the Etihad Stadium will hamper his progress as a player and put his career in further misery.

title: Tres heridos y muerto en refriega de campesinos “bolos” con policías
creator: Diario La Tribuna
description: TALANGA, Francisco Morazán. Un total de tres agentes de la Policía Nacional heridos y un civil muerto dejó como saldo un enfrentamiento que tuvo lugar...
content: Un total de tres agentes de la Policía Nacional heridos y un civil muerto dejó como saldo un enfrentamiento que tuvo lugar la noche del domingo anterior en un sector de este municipio, adyacente a la capital. Según las informaciones, el domingo a eso de las 10:00 de la noche, un comisario y agentes policiales instalaron un retén en la carretera que de Talanga da acceso al municipio de Cedros, siempre al norte de Francisco Morazán. Cerca de esa zona se celebraban unas carreras de cintas de caballos, por lo que decenas de pobladores se habían ido a disfrutar del jaripeo municipal. A bordo de un vehículo tipo pick up se desplazaba un grupo de personas en completo estado de ebriedad, todos armados con filosos machetes. Los agentes asignados a la Unidad Metropolitana Policial 8 (Umep-8), hicieron orden de parada a los parroquianos. Pero estos cegados por el alcohol se abalanzaron contra las fuerzas del orden, con la intención de matar a los uniformados de la Policía Nacional, se indicó. En el ataque, los ebrios lograron herir a tres elementos, un oficial con el grado de comisario, un clase de Policía y un agente. Ante esta situación de alto riesgo y en un acto de legítima defensa, los funcionarios se vieron obligados a defenderse y proteger su vida en el momento en que los sospechosos intentaron desarmar a los agentes del orden. Como respuesta, los agentes abatieron a uno de los agresores de nombre Daniel Cristóbal Torres Turcios (58), resultando herido de bala otro civil, cuya identidad hasta ayer tarde no se había precisado. Minutos después los uniformados lograron someter a los otros atacantes. Después de la refriega, varios de los policías resultaron con heridas de gravedad con cortes de machete en los brazos, manos y torsos. Incluso, uno de ellos sufrió herida cortante en una pierna. Los policías fueron trasladados de inmediato a centros asistenciales en la capital, donde su condición sigue reservada. Lamentablemente uno de los policías corre el riesgo de perder la mano debido a la gravedad de las lesiones cortantes causadas por machete. “Este incidente resalta el alto precio que los miembros de la Policía Nacional pagan diariamente en su valiente labor de confrontar la delincuencia común y los peligros asociados a controlar a individuos violentos y armados bajo los efectos del alcohol”, explicó el jefe de comunicaciones y estrategias de la Secretaría de Seguridad, Miguel Martínez Madrid. “La valentía y sacrificio de nuestros funcionarios policiales reflejan el compromiso inquebrantable de la institución por mantener la seguridad y el orden en nuestras comunidades”, afirmó. La Policía Nacional reitera su llamado a la ciudadanía para colaborar en el mantenimiento del orden público y evitar situaciones de violencia que ponen en riesgo tanto a los ciudadanos como a los agentes encargados de su protección, instó. A la zona donde se dio el violento enfrentamiento entre fuerzas del orden y campesinos llegaron enardecidos parientes de los atacantes quienes alegaron que lo sucedido fue culpa de los policías. Varias mujeres indicaron que los uniformados instalaron el retén con la intención de exigir dinero a motoristas o las personas que regresaban en estado de ebriedad de la celebración municipal. “Ellos (policías) sabían cómo andaban estos muchachos, unos tomados y con armas, por eso los estaban esperando aquí en este retén”, señaló una de las féminas. “Si Daniel les salió con ese machete por qué no le dispararon a los pies, aunque se los hubiesen quebrado, sino que dispararon a matar”, repetía la enojada mujer. (

title: Fabrizio Romano speaks out on wonderkid’s future amid Man United & Arsenal transfer links
creator: Mark Brus
description: Transfer news expert Fabrizio Romano has spoken exclusively to CaughtOffside about the future of Rennes wonderkid Desire Doue amid links with Manchester United and Arsenal. The 18-year-old attacking midfielder looks like a huge prospect and Romano has written for the Daily Briefing about the long list of clubs showing an interest in him this summer, [...]The post Fabrizio Romano speaks out on wonderkid’s future amid Man United & Arsenal transfer links appeared first on CaughtOffside.
content: The 18-year-old attacking midfielder looks like a huge prospect and Romano has written for about the long list of clubs showing an interest in him this summer, even if it’s too early to be talking about anything concrete. Doue has been strongly linked with the likes of Man Utd and Arsenal by the , but it remains to be seen if we’ll definitely be seeing him making the move to a Premier League club. Romano says Doue is considered an exciting talent after his performances in Ligue 1, and there’s interest from a lot of different countries, so it seems this one remains open for the time being. “Staying with United, we’ve seen them linked, along with many other clubs, with Rennes wonderkid Desire Doue, who is doing fantastic with his performances in Ligue 1,” . “Honestly, though, I could mention six or seven clubs interested in Doue – interest is strong, but it’s really early. So we have to be patient on this one. For sure, interest is there from several countries as he’s considered a top, top talent.” Doue transfer: Should he pick Arsenal or United? If it does come down to a choice between Arsenal and United, one imagines choosing to link up with Mikel Arteta at the Emirates Stadium would be a no-brainer. The Frenchman could be taking a huge risk going to the Red Devils right now, as so many top players have gone backwards at Old Trafford in this challenging post-Sir Alex Ferguson era. Arsenal, by contrast, mostly seem to improve every player they sign at the moment, so they could be ideal to help Doue in his development, while there’s also the bonus of them having Champions League football on offer next season.

title: Tulum Summer Club: Where Every Bite is a Summer Vacation
creator: Ayen Molina
description: As the season heats up, there’s no better way to cool down than lounging, eating, and drinking by the pool. Look no further – Tulum has launched its Summer Club....The post Tulum Summer Club: Where Every Bite is a Summer Vacation appeared first on Marhaba Qatar.
content: Situated on the seventh floor of the , Tulum presents a bohemian-chic flair within a serene setting adjacent to the pool. It serves as an ideal haven for relaxation and summer enjoyment, complete with poolside dining. As we made our entrance, the hospitable marketing manager, along with Tulum’s Ariana, greeted us warmly. The pool looked inviting as Ariana handed us towels and bracelets, signifying that we were free to enjoy a dip in the pool whenever we wished. And even before we could take the plunge, we were treated to , which brought out the child within me. The Summer Club weekday menu features refreshing dishes and drinks to transport guests to a tropical paradise, from light and healthy options to indulgent treats. We started with their homemade guacamole and nachos, which is my ultimate comfort food – so satisfying that I could contentedly sit all day with just this and a beverage in hand. This delightful beginning was followed by a with black-eyed beans and avocado, topped with a hibiscus flower reduction, and the , a delectable mix of tender and savoury flank steak, crispy tortilla, avocado, beans, and cheese. Ariana handed us the beverage menu, but we requested a surprise, specifying a preference for little or no sugar. Soon after, two tiki glasses arrived: one with , a blend of hibiscus, cinnamon, rice milk, and raspberry puree, and the other with , combining pineapple, passion fruit puree, tarragon syrup, yuzu, and ginger ale – both drinks were perfect for the summer heat. Then it’s time for the main course: savoury , tender chicken encased in soft corn tortillas, accompanied by black beans, avocado, and sour cream, and the , a succulent grilled flank steak presented with halloumi cheese, sautéed corn, and Mexican rice, rounded out with pieces of tortilla. You can enjoy the dish on its own or create your own wrap with the steak. After such a hearty meal, a swim felt like the perfect choice. Hours later, refreshed from our time in the water, we returned to our table for the grand finale – a creamy and a , all while a live DJ set the vibe. Tulum is open to guests every day from noon until midnight. The Summer Club offers a set weekday menu priced at QAR199 per person, which includes soft drinks and pool access, or you can upgrade with QAR150 for enhanced beverages. On Fridays, they have a brunch buffet from noon to 4 pm for QAR249 with soft drinks or QAR349 with enhanced beverages; both options include pool access. The pool closes at 8 pm.

title: لتونی: دلیلی برای ممانعت اوکراین از حمله به خاک روسیه وجود ندارد
description: رئیس جمهور لتونی می‌گوید که از نظر وی هیچ دلیلی وجود ندارد که جلوی حمله اوکراین با خاک روسیه گرفته شود!
content: به گزاری به نقل از تاس، اِدگارز رینکویکس، رئیس جمهور لتونی بر این باور است که هیچ دلیلی برای ممانعت اوکراین از حمله به خاک روسیه وجود ندارد! رئیس جمهور لتونی پیشروی روسیه را در اوکراین «یکی از پیامدهای ناتوانی غرب در تامین سلاح برای اوکراین و اعمال محدودیت درباره نحوه و محل استفاده از این تسلیحات» عنوان کرده است. ینس استولتنبرگ، دبیرکل ناتو پیش‌تر به اکونومیست گفت که این ائتلاف نظامی در حال بررسی صدور مجوز استفاده ارتش اوکراین از تسلیحات اعطایی غرب علیه اهداف واقع در خاک روسیه است. استولتنبرگ در عین حال مدعی شد که نیروهای ناتو نباید به تجهیزات نظامی روسیه در حریم هوایی یا زمینی اوکراین حمله کنند. به گفته وی، در این صورت «مادر شرایطی قرار خواهیم گرفت که دور نگه داشتن ناتو از جنگ بسیار دشوار خواهد بود.»

title: В Киеве сотрудники военкомата устроили насильственную мобилизацию на улице
creator: Екатерина Грищенко
content: В Киеве сотрудники ТЦК (территориальный центр комплектования; украинский аналог военкомата — прим. «Ленты.ру» ) начали насильственную мобилизацию мужчин на улицах города. Об этом сообщает украинское издание «Страна.ua» в Telegram . В социальных сетях появилось видео, на котором несколько граждан в военной форме, а также сотрудники правоохранительных органов силой задерживают мужчину. По словам очевидцев, инцидент произошел в районе «Караваевых дач». Как сообщал сотрудник ТЦК Владимир Гренюх, на Украине по повестке в военкомат приходят только два процента граждан. По этой причине, добавил работник территориального центра комплектования, он поддерживает жесткие меры по мобилизации. Ранее о терроре сотрудниками военкомата населения в подконтрольном Киеву Херсоне рассказывал губернатор Херсонской области Владимир Сальдо. По его словам, работники ТЦК ловят людей «как зверей на улицах, на блокпостах, в квартирах и отправляют на убой».

title: NRW-Ministerpräsident Wüst will Pflichtversicherung für Millionen Bürger
creator: Marian von Hatzfeld
description: Gibt es bald eine neue Pflichtversicherung? NRW-Ministerpräsident Hendrik Wüst (CDU) drängt aktuell auf eine Regelung für Naturkatastrophen – warum?
content: Stand: 28.05.2024, 10:11 Uhr Von: Marian von Hatzfeld Gibt es bald eine neue Pflichtversicherung? NRW-Ministerpräsident Hendrik Wüst (CDU) drängt aktuell auf eine Regelung für Naturkatastrophen – warum? Dortmund – Flutkatastrophen, zerstörte Häuser und überschwemmte Straßen: Vielen in NRW dürften die Hochwasser-Bilder aus dem Ahrtal oder anderen Städten in NRW noch präsent sein. Nach dem aktuellen Vorfall im Saarland schlägt NRW -Ministerpräsident Hendrik Wüst jetzt Alarm. Er kritisiert die Bundesregierung und fordert eine Pflichtversicherung. NRW-Ministerpräsident Wüst will Pflichtversicherung für Millionen Bürger „Eine Pflichtversicherung für Elementarschäden würde nicht nur vielen Menschen Sicherheit geben und sie im Ernstfall vor dem wirtschaftlichen Ruin bewahren“, sagte er dem Redaktionsnetzwerk Deutschland. Wüst fügt hinzu: „Wir würden damit auch im Sinne des Steuerzahlers handeln, der nach den jetzigen Regelungen immer wieder für Milliarden-Schäden geradestehen muss. Das kann einfach nicht sein.“ Dann übt er scharfe Kritik. „Ist einfach nur fahrlässig“ – NRW-Ministerpräsident kritisiert Bundesregierung wegen Hochwasserkatastrophen „Dass wir sie zwei Jahre später immer noch nicht haben, ist einfach nur fahrlässig“, sagt Wüst über die Pflichtversicherung gegen die Folgen von Naturkatastrophen. Der Bundesrat hätte vor mehr als einem Jahr die bundesweite Einführung einer solchen Versicherung gefordert. Die Bundesregierung hätte die Regelung seinerzeit aber abgewehrt und eine zu hohe Belastung privater Haushalte befürchtet. Der NRW-Ministerpräsident sieht das anders und bescheinigt Tatenlosigkeit. Eine Belastung im Schadensfall könne vielfach höher und sogar existenzbedrohend sein. Hochwasser in NRW: „Länder haben Bund einstimmig aufgefordert rechtliche Grundlagen zu schaffen.“ Laut Wüst hätten die Länder den Bund einstimmig aufgefordert, rechtliche Grundladen für eine Pflichtversicherung zu schaffen. Dies sei auch eine Lehre aus der Hochwasserkatastrophe 2021. Jetzt scheint die Diskussion aber erneut Fahrt aufzunehmen (hier weitere News zu Geld und Finanzen aus NRW bei RUHR24 lesen). Laut der Deutschen Presseagentur (dpa) beraten sich die Länderchefs und Bundeskanzler Olaf Scholz (SPD) am 20. Juni. Dabei geht es dann erneut um die Pflichtversicherung für Schäden durch Naturkatastrophen. Ministerpräsident Hendrik Wüst dürfte auch dann auf die Einführung hoffen. In NRW zeigt derweil eine Karte aktuelle Warnungen für die durch den Klimawandel steigende Hochwasser-Gefahr an.
